  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-832">**BackEndHttpStatus** – kód protokolu HTTP oznámený pri komunikácii so serverom Exchange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-832">**BackEndHttpStatus -** http code reported when talking to exchange back end</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-834">**BEServer** – názov servera Exchange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-834">**BEServer -** the back-end exchange server name</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-836">**Call(n)\_TokenAuthError** – chyba overenia n-tého pokusu o volanie služby</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-836">**Call(n)\_TokenAuthError -** the auth error of the nth service call attempt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-840">**Date** – hodnota vrátená zo servera Exchange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-840">**Date -** value returned by exchange server</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-841">**DiagInfo** – informácie vrátené zo servera Exchange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-841">**DiagInfo -** information returned by exchange server</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-842">**End\_TicketAuthError** – každá chyba pri získavaní overovacieho lístka po volaní služby</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-842">**End\_TicketAuthError -** any error in getting the auth ticket after service call</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-843">**End\_TokenIsValid** – označuje, či je overovací lístok platný po volaní služby</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-843">**End\_TokenIsValid -** whether the auth ticket is valid after the service call</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-844">**EndingIdentityState** – nahlásený stav objektov identity po uskutočnení volania služby</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-844">**EndingIdentityState -** identity objects reported state after making the service calls</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-981">**ErrorCode2** – kód chyby z vykonania vytvorenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-981">**ErrorCode2** - Error code from executing the creation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-983">**Id** – jedinečný identifikátor (GUID) pre vytvorenie kontajnera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-983">**Id** - A unique identifier (GUID) for the container creation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-987">**ResetErrorCode3** – dodatočný kód chyby po príkaze resetovania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-987">**ResetErrorCode3** - Additional error code after reset command.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1078">**PromptType** – označuje, aký typ výzvy sa zobrazil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1078">**PromptType** - what type of prompt was shown</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1079">**VBAMacroAntiVirusHash** – antivírusová hodnota hash makra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1079">**VBAMacroAntiVirusHash** - antivirus hash of the macro</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1080">**VBAMacroAntiVirusHRESULT** – výsledok antivírusového hodnotenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1080">**VBAMacroAntiVirusHRESULT** - result of the antivirus assessment</span></span>

#### <a name="officesecuritymacrovbasecureruntimesessionenablestate"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-1081">Office.Security.Macro.VBASecureRuntimeSessionEnableState</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1081">Office.Security.Macro.VBASecureRuntimeSessionEnableState</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1082">Sleduje každé overenie režimu Runtime AMSI, ktoré sa uskutoční pri spustení makra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1082">Tracks each AMSI runtime verification performed when a macro executes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1083">Sleduje efektivitu overenia režimu Runtime AMSI pri spustení makra a identifikuje chyby, ktoré môžu mať vplyv na zabezpečenie koncových používateľov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1083">Tracks effectiveness of the AMSI runtime verification of Macro execution and identify errors that could impact security of end users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1084">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1084">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1085">**IsRegistry** – označuje, či správca nastavil nejaké prepisovanie v databáze Registry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1085">**IsRegistry** - did admin set some override in registry</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1086">**State** – označuje, aký je stav zabezpečenia režimu Runtime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1086">**State** - what is the state to for secure runtime</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1088">Sleduje, keď sa používateľovi zobrazí výzva na povolenie makier XL4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1088">Tracks when a user is prompted to enable XL4 Macros.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1089">Umožňuje vyhodnotiť výskyt makier XL4 v Exceli a zavádzať budúce obmedzenia rizík zabezpečenia, ktoré predvolene blokujú XL4 v rámci odozvy na incidenty zabezpečenia, ktoré sa týkajú zneužitia makier XL4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1089">Used to assess prevalence of XL4 Macros in Excel to drive future security mitigations that block XL4 by default in response to security incidents that involve abusing XL4 macros.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1091">**PromptType** – označuje, aký typ výzvy sa zobrazil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1091">**PromptType** - what type of prompt was shown</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1093">Sleduje, keď sa používateľovi zobrazí upozornenie zabezpečenia pri načítaní ovládacieho prvku ActiveX, ktorý je označený ako nebezpečný na inicializáciu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1093">Tracks when a security prompt is shown to the user when loading an ActiveX control that is marked Unsafe for Initialization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1094">Umožňuje sledovať výskyt ovládacích prvkov UFI ActiveX v dokumentoch balíka Office a zavádzať obmedzenia rizík (napr. ovládacie prvky Killbitting) v rámci odozvy na incidenty zabezpečenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1094">Used to track prevalence of UFI ActiveX controls in Office documents to drive mitigations (for example, killbitting controls) in response to security incidents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1095">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1095">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1096">**IsFromInternet** – označuje, či je dokument otvorený z internetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1096">**IsFromInternet** - is the document opened from internet</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1097">**IsSecureReaderMode** – označuje, či je dokument otvorený v zabezpečenej čítačke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1097">**IsSecureReaderMode** - is the document opened in secure reader</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1098">**OcxTrustCenterSettings** – označuje, aké je aktuálne nastavenie technológie ActiveX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1098">**OcxTrustCenterSettings** - what is the current ActiveX setting</span></span>


#### <a name="officesecuritysecurereaderhostopeninosr"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-1099">Office.Security.SecureReaderHost.OpenInOSR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1099">Office.Security.SecureReaderHost.OpenInOSR</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1100">Sleduje dokončenie otvorenia súboru v chránenom zobrazení.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1100">Tracks completion of an open in Protected View.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1101">Umožňuje diagnostiku podmienok, ktoré vedú k zlyhaniu pri otváraní súborov v chránenom zobrazení, čo má vplyv na zabezpečenie a produktivitu zákazníkov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1101">Used to diagnose conditions that lead to failures when opening files in Protected View impacting security and productivity of customers.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1103">Žiadne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1103">None</span></span>

### <a name="application-feature-success-subtype"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-1110">*Podtyp Úspešnosť funkcie aplikácie*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1110">*Application feature success subtype*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1111">Úspešnosť fungovania aplikácie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1111">Success of application functionality.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1112">Obmedzené na otvorenie a zatvorenie aplikácie a dokumentov, úpravu súborov a zdieľanie súborov (spoluprácu).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1112">Limited to opening and closing of the application and documents, file editing, and file sharing (collaboration).</span></span>

#### <a name="accountaction"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-1113">account.action</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1113">account.action</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1114">Potrebné na zabezpečenie správneho fungovania konfigurácie konta a používa sa na monitorovanie stavu vytvárania konta, možnosti pridávania nových e-mailových kont a monitorovania mäkkých resetov kont</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1114">Needed to ensure account configuration is operating successfully and is used to monitor health of account creation, ability to add new email accounts, and monitor soft account resets</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1115">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1115">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1116">**account_calendar_count** – koľko kalendárov má konto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1116">**account_calendar_count** - how many calendars the account has</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1117">**action** – typ vykonanej akcie, napr. create_account alebo delete_account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1117">**action** - type of action performed, for example, create_account, delete_account.</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1118">**duration_seconds** – trvanie akcie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1118">**duration_seconds** - duration of the action</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1119">**entry_point** – vstupný bod akcie, spôsob spustenia akcie používateľom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1119">**entry_point** - entry point of the action, how the user started the action</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1120">**has_hx** – označuje, či má zariadenie konto, ktoré používa našu novú službu synchronizácie pošty, nejedná sa nevyhnutne o konto, v ktorom bola akcia vykonaná</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1120">**has_hx** - whether the device has an account that is using our new mail syncing service, not necessarily the account that the action was performed upon</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1121">**is_hx** – ide o konto používajúce našu novú službu synchronizácie pošty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1121">**is_hx** - is the account using our new mail syncing service</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1122">**is_shared_mailbox** – označuje, či sa akcia vzťahuje na zdieľanú poštovú schránku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1122">**is_shared_mailbox** - whether the action pertains to a shared mailbox</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1123">**number_of_accounts** – celkový počet kont, v ktorých bola akcia vykonaná</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1123">**number_of_accounts** - total number of accounts that the action is performed on</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1124">**result** – výsledok akcie, napr. úspech alebo neúspech.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1124">**result** - result for the action, for example, success, failure.</span></span>
   
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1125">**server_type** – typ servera pre konto, podobný ako pre account_type</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1125">**server_type** - the server type for the account, similar to account_type</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1126">**shared_type** – typ zdieľaného konta (ak je konto zdieľané)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1126">**shared_type** - type of shared account (if the account is shared)</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1127">**scope** – rozsah akcie, pre akciu delete je to this_device alebo all_devices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1127">**scope** - the scope of the action; for delete account, this_device or all_devices</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1128">**total_calendar_accounts** – počet kont kalendárov v aplikácii v čase akcie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1128">**total_calendar_accounts** - count of calendar accounts in the app at time of action</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1129">**total_email_accounts** – počet e-mailových kont v aplikácii v čase akcie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1129">**total_email_accounts** - count of email accounts in the app at time of action</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1130">**total_file_accounts** – počet kont súborov v aplikácii v čase akcie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1130">**total_file_accounts** - count of file accounts in the app at time of action</span></span>

#### <a name="accountlifecycle"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-1131">account.lifecycle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1131">account.lifecycle</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1132">Táto udalosť sa zhromažďuje na zabezpečenie správneho fungovania konfigurácie konta a používa sa na monitorovanie stavu vytvárania konta, možnosti pridávania nových e-mailových kont a monitorovania mäkkých resetov kont.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1132">This event is collected to ensure account configuration is operating successfully and is used to monitor health of account creation, ability to add new email accounts, and monitor soft account resets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1133">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1133">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1134">**account_creation_source** – voliteľná vlastnosť, ktorá sa používa na nájdenie a diagnostiku akýchkoľvek problémov, ktoré sa vyskytnú pri vytváraní konta pri pridávaní typu akcie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1134">**account_creation_source** – optional property that is used to find and diagnose any issues that happen during account creation when the action type is add.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1135">Môže mať hodnoty, ako sú single sign-on (SSO), create_new_account, manual, atď.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1135">It can have values like single sign-on (SSO), create_new_account, manual, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1136">**action** – typ akcie vykonanej na konte, napríklad pridanie, odstránenie alebo resetovanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1136">**action** - The type of action performed on the account, such as add, remove, or reset</span></span>

#### <a name="addnewaccountstep"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-1137">add.new.account.step</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1137">add.new.account.step</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1138">Táto udalosť nám umožňuje zistiť, ako ďaleko sa používateľ dostal vo formulári vytvorenia nového konta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1138">This event lets us detect how far the user has gotten in the create new account form.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1139">Označuje, keď používateľ prešiel do ďalšieho kroku, alebo či zrušil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1139">It indicates when the user has moved to another step or if they have dropped off.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1140">Tieto informácie potrebujeme na určenie, či niektoré kroky zlyhávajú, a na zaručenie, že vytvorenie používateľského konta bolo úspešné.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1140">We need this information to detect if any steps are failing and to ensure user account creation was successful.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1141">Zhromažďuje sa toto pole:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1141">The following field is collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1142">**OTAddAccountCurrentStep** – môže mať tieto hodnoty: profile_form, redirect_mobile_check, mobile_check_success</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1142">**OTAddAccountCurrentStep** - That can have the following values: profile_form, redirect_mobile_check, mobile_check_success</span></span>

#### <a name="apperror"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-1143">app.error</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1143">app.error</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1144">Sleduje použité kritické chyby aplikácie, aby sme mohli zabrániť problémom, ktoré by mohli spôsobiť zlyhanie aplikácie alebo zabránenie čítaniu e-mailov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1144">Tracks critical app errors used so that we can prevent issues that could cause your app to crash or prevent you from reading email.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1145">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1145">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1146">**clientName** – názov klienta pre cloudový súbor, kde sa vyskytla chyba (ak je k dispozícii).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1146">**clientName** - The name of the client for the cloud file where the error occurred, if applicable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1147">**cloudfile_error_type** – typ chyby, ktorá sa vyskytla pre cloudový súbor (ak je k dispozícii).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1147">**cloudfile_error_type** - The type of error that occurred for the cloud file, if applicable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1148">**cloudfile_response_name** – názov odozvy pre chybu, ktorá sa vyskytla pre cloudový súbor (ak je k dispozícii).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1148">**cloudfile_response_name** - The response name for the error that occurred for the cloud file, if applicable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1149">**component_name** – názov súčasti aplikácie, v ktorej sa vyskytla chyba, napríklad pošta alebo kalendár.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1149">**component_name** - The name of the component of the app where the error occurred, such as mail or calendar.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1150">**debug_info** – informácie o chybe, ktorá sa vyskytla pre cloudový súbor, slúžiace na určenie príčiny chyby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1150">**debug_info** - Information on the error that occurred for the cloud file in order to be able to determine why the error happened.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1151">**error_origin_identifier** – pôvod chyby, ktorá sa vyskytla pri koncepte, v ktorom sa vyskytla chyba (ak je k dispozícii).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1151">**error_origin_identifier** - Origin of the error that occurred on the draft that the error occurred, if applicable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1152">**error_type** – typ chyby, ktorá sa vyskytla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1152">**error_type** - The type of error that occurred.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1153">Medzi príklady patrí ukladanie konceptu, odoslanie konceptu a chyba cloudového súboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1153">Some examples include save draft, send draft, and cloud file error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1154">**exdate** – dátum rozšíreného pravidla (vzťahuje sa iba na chyby opakovania plánovanej činnosti) *[Toto pole sa odstránilo z aktuálnych zostáv balíka Office, ale stále sa môže zobraziť v starších zostavách.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1154">**exdate** - the extended rule date (only applies to appointment recurrence errors) *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1155">**exrule** – hodnota rozšíreného pravidla (vzťahuje sa iba na chyby opakovania plánovanej činnosti) *[Toto pole sa odstránilo z aktuálnych zostáv balíka Office, ale stále sa môže zobraziť v starších zostavách.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1155">**exrule** - the extended rule value (only applies to appointment recurrence errors) *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1156">**has_attachments** – znázorňuje, či má koncept, v ktorom sa vyskytla chyba, prílohy (ak je k dispozícii).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1156">**has_attachments** - Reflects if the draft the error occurred on has attachments, if applicable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1157">**is_IRM_protected** – znázorňuje, či je koncept, v ktorom sa vyskytla chyba, chránený Správou prístupových práv k informáciám (ak je k dispozícii).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1157">**is_IRM_protected** - Reflects if the draft the error occurred on is protected by information rights management, if applicable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1158">**is_legitimate** – znázorňuje, či chyba pochádza z programovacej chyby alebo nie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1158">**is_legitimate** - Reflects if the error comes from a programming error or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1159">Chyby programovania sa považujú za neoprávnené.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1159">Programming errors are considered non-legitimate.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1160">**is_local** – znázorňuje, či je koncept, v ktorom sa vyskytla chyba, synchronizovaný so serverom (ak je k dispozícii).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1160">**is_local** - Reflects if the draft the error occurred on has synced to the server, if applicable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1161">**is_recoverable** – znázorňuje, či je možné obnovenie po chybe alebo či ide o závažnú chybu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1161">**is_recoverable** - Reflects if the error can be recovered from or if it is a fatal error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1162">**rdate** – dátum pravidla opakovania (vzťahuje sa iba na chyby opakovania plánovanej činnosti) *[Toto pole sa odstránilo z aktuálnych zostáv balíka Office, ale stále sa môže zobraziť v starších zostavách.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1162">**rdate** - the date of the recurrence rule (only applies to appointment recurrence errors) *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1163">**rrule** – samotné pravidlo opakovania (vzťahuje sa iba na chyby opakovania plánovanej činnosti) *[Toto pole sa odstránilo z aktuálnych zostáv balíka Office, ale stále sa môže zobraziť v starších zostavách.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1163">**rrule** - the recurrence rule itself (only applies to appointment recurrence errors) *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1164">**rrule_error_message** – chybové hlásenie o analýze pravidla opakovania (vzťahuje sa iba na chyby opakovania plánovanej činnosti) *[Toto pole sa odstránilo z aktuálnych zostáv balíka Office, ale stále sa môže zobraziť v starších zostavách.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1164">**rrule_error_message** - recurrence rule parsing error message (only applies to appointment recurrence errors) *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1165">**rrule_error_type** – typ chyby analýzy pravidla opakovania (vzťahuje sa iba na chyby opakovania plánovanej činnosti) *[Toto pole sa odstránilo z aktuálnych zostáv balíka Office, ale stále sa môže zobraziť v starších zostavách.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1165">**rrule_error_type** - recurrence rule parsing error type (only applies to appointment recurrence errors) *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1166">**status_code** –kód stavu chyby, ktorá sa vyskytla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1166">**status_code** - The status code of the error that occurred.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1167">Pomáha pochopiť príčinu chyby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1167">This helps us understand the cause of the error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1168">Možné vlastnosti sú aj všetky znaky.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1168">All characters are also possible properties.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1169">Pomáha pochopiť znaky v texte hlásenia konceptu, keď sa vyskytla chyba.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1169">This helps us understand the characters in the body of the draft message when the error occurred.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1170">Možné vlastnosti sú napríklad „a“, „b“ alebo „c“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1170">For example, "a", "b", "c" are possible properties.</span></span>

#### <a name="applaunchreport"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-1171">app.launch.report</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1171">app.launch.report</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1172">Táto udalosť nám umožňuje zistiť a vyriešiť problémy spôsobujúce pomalé alebo neúplné spúšťanie Outlooku, čo používateľom sťažuje používanie aplikácie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1172">This event lets us detect and fix issues where Outlook is starting slowly or incompletely, making it difficult for users to use our app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1173">Patria sem informácie o konkrétnych povolených funkciách a o dĺžke trvania spustenia konkrétnych častí.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1173">This includes information on the specific features that were enabled and how long parts of the startup took.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1174">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1174">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1175">**is_agenda_widget_active** – uvádza, či je miniaplikácia agendy aktívna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1175">**is_agenda_widget_active** - Tells us if the agenda widget is active.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1176">**is_alert_available** – hovorí nám, či má aplikácia nakonfigurované povolenie upozornení v oznámeniach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1176">**is_alert_available** - Tell us if the app has been configured to allow alerts in notifications.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1177">**is_background_refresh_available** – hovorí, či je aplikácia nakonfigurovaná tak, aby sa mohla aktualizovať na pozadí.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1177">**is_background_refresh_available** - Tells if the app has been configured to be able to refresh in the background.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1178">**is_badge_available** – hovorí nám, či má aplikácia nakonfigurované povolenie štítkov v oznámeniach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1178">**is_badge_available** - Tell us if the app has been configured to allow badges in notifications.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1179">**is_intune_managed** – hovorí nám, či je aplikácia spravovaná službou Intune.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1179">**is_intune_managed** - Tell us if the app is managed by Intune.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1180">**is_registered_for_remote_notifications** – hovorí nám, či má aplikácia zaregistrované vzdialené oznámenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1180">**is_registered_for_remote_notifications** - Tell us if the app has been registered for remote notifications.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1181">**is_sound_available** – hovorí nám, či má aplikácia nakonfigurované povolenie zvukov v oznámeniach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1181">**is_sound_available** - Tell us if the app has been configured to allow sounds in notifications.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1182">**is_watch_app_installed** – uvádza, či bola nainštalovaná hodinková aplikácia Outlook.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1182">**is_watch_app_installed** - Tells us if the watch Outlook app has been installed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1183">**is_watch_paired** – hovorí nám, či je hodinková aplikácia Outlook spárovaná s hlavnou aplikáciou Outlook.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1183">**is_watch_paired** - Tell us if the watch Outlook app is paired with the main Outlook app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1184">**launch_to_db_ready_ms** – hovorí nám množstvo času od spustenia aplikácie Outlook po moment, kedy bola databáza pripravená.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1184">**launch_to_db_ready_ms** - Tell us the amount of time the Outlook app spent from launch to the database being ready.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1185">**num_calendar_accounts** – uvádza počet kont kalendára v aplikácii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1185">**num_calendar_accounts** - Tells us the number of calendar accounts in the app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1186">**num_cloud_file_accounts** – uvádza počet kont ukladacieho priestoru v aplikácii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1186">**num_cloud_file_accounts** - Tells us the number of storage accounts in the app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1187">**num_hx_calendar_accounts** – uvádza počet kont kalendára v aplikácii, ktoré sú pripojené k našej novej službe synchronizácie pošty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1187">**num_hx_calendar_accounts** - Tells us the number of calendar accounts in the app that connect to our new mail syncing service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1188">**num_hx_mail_accounts** – uvádza počet poštových kont v aplikácii, ktoré sú pripojené k našej novej službe synchronizácie pošty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1188">**num_hx_mail_accounts** - Tells us the number of mail accounts in the app that connect to our new mail syncing service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1189">**num_calendar_accounts** – uvádza počet poštových kont v aplikácii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1189">**num_mail_accounts** - Tells us the number of mail accounts in the app.</span></span>

#### <a name="calendaraction"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-1190">calendar.action</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1190">calendar.action</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1191">Používa sa na sledovanie akéhokoľvek možného nepriaznivého vplyvu na schopnosť vykonávať základné akcie kalendára, ako je vytváranie alebo úprava udalostí.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1191">Used for monitoring any possible negative impact on your ability to perform core calendar actions like creating or editing events.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1192">Udalosť tiež môže obsahovať rad názvov vlastností a to, či sa zmenili, alebo nie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1192">The event could also include a series of property names and if they have changed or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1193">Napríklad „title_changed“, „online_meeting_changed“ a „description_changed“ sú názvy zahrnutých vlastností, vďaka ktorým dokážeme zistiť, či sa vyskytli nejaké problémy s úpravou určitých vlastností.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1193">For example, "title_changed", "online_meeting_changed", and "description_changed" are property names that are included to help us understand if there are any issues with editing certain properties.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-1194">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1194">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1195">**account_sfb_enabled** – pomáha správne nakonfigurovať Skype for Business.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1195">**account_sfb_enabled** - Helps us make sure that Skype for Business is configured correctly.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1196">**action** – typ akcie, ktorá bola vykonaná v kalendári.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1196">**action** - The type of action that was performed on the calendar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1197">Patria sem akcie ako otvorenie, úpravy, pridanie skratky, odloženie atď. Pomáha zabezpečiť, aby kalendár fungoval podľa očakávania a nič sa nepokazilo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1197">This includes things like open, editing, adding shortcut, snooze, etc. Helps us ensure our calendar experience is functioning as expected and nothing has broken</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1198">**action_result** – výsledok akcie vykonanej na súčastiach kalendára.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1198">**action_result** - Result of the action taken on calendar components.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1199">Môžu sem patriť hodnoty ako úspech, neúspech, neznáme a časový limit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1199">This can include values such as success, failure, unknown, and timeout.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1200">Slúži na sledovanie úspešnosti akcií a na zistenie, či neexistuje rozsiahly problém s akciami v kalendári.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1200">Used to track the success rate of actions and determine if there is a widespread issue with calendar actions.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1201">**attendee_busy_status** – voľný/zaneprázdnený stav účastníka, ktorého sa akcia týka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1201">**attendee_busy_status** - The free/busy status of the attendee that the action is related to.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1202">Táto hodnota môže byť voľný, zaneprázdnený alebo nezáväzne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1202">This value can be free, busy, or tentative.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1203">Pomáha pochopiť, či sa vyskytol problém s akciami týkajúcimi sa určitého zaneprázdneného stavu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1203">Helps us understand if there is an issue with actions related to a certain busy status.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1204">**availability** – hodnota dostupnosti, ak sa hodnota voľný/zaneprázdnený na schôdzi zmenila.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1204">**availability** - The availability value if the free/busy value has changed on the meeting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1205">Pomáha pochopiť, či sa vyskytli problémy s nastavením určitej hodnoty dostupnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1205">Helps us understand if there are issues with setting a certain availability value.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1206">**calendar_onlinemeeting_default_provider** – obsahuje predvoleného poskytovateľa online schôdzí, ktorý sa používa pri vytváraní online schôdzí podporovaných serverom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1206">**calendar_onlinemeeting_default_provider** - Contains the default online meeting provider for use with server-supported online meeting creation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1207">Patrí sem napríklad Skype, Skype for Business, Hangouts a Teams for Business.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1207">This includes types of Skype, Skype for Business, Hangout, and Teams for Business.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1208">Pomáha diagnostikovať možné problémy pri vytváraní online schôdzí niektorých poskytovateľov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1208">Helps us diagnose potential issues with creating online meetings on certain providers.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1209">**calendar_onlinemeeting_enabled** – má hodnotu true, ak kalendár podporuje tvorbu online schôdzí podporovaných serverom na základe predvoleného poskytovateľa online schôdzí.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1209">**calendar_onlinemeeting_enabled** - True if the calendar supports server-supported online meeting creation based on a default online meeting provider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1210">Pomáha pochopiť, či sa vyskytli nejaké problémy s kalendármi s povolenými online schôdzami.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1210">Helps us understand if there are any issues with online meeting enabled calendars.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1211">**calendar_type** – typ kalendára, v ktorom sa udalosť bude nachádzať po úprave schôdze používateľom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1211">**calendar_type** - The type of calendar an event is on after the user has edited the meeting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1212">Možné hodnoty sú primárny, sekundárny, zdieľaný a skupinový.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1212">Possible values include primary, secondary, shared, and group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1213">Pomáha pochopiť, či sa vyskytli problémy s niektorým typom kalendára.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1213">Helps us understand if there are issues with a certain calendar type.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1214">**delete_action_origin** – pôvod vykonanej akcie odstránenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1214">**delete_action_origin** - The origin of the delete action performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1215">Patria sem hodny ako navigačný panel, panel s nástrojmi a tabletkový panel s nástrojmi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1215">This includes values such as navigation bar toolbar and capsule toolbar.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1216">Pomáha pochopiť, či sa vyskytli nejaké problémy pri odstraňovaní schôdze z určitého umiestnenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1216">Helps us understand if there are any issues with deleting a meeting from a certain location.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1217">**distribution_list_count** – počet účastníkov v distribučných zoznamoch.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1217">**distribution_list_count** - Number of attendees that are on distribution lists.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1218">Pomáha sledovať, či sa nevyskytli problémy s účastníkmi v distribučných zoznamoch.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1218">Helps us track if there are issues with attendees that are on distribution lists.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1219">**guest_count** – počet hostí na schôdzi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1219">**guest_count** - The number of guests on the meeting.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1220">Pomáha so správnym pridávaním hostí.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1220">Helps us make sure that the guests are being added correctly.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1221">**is_all_day** – spolu s „meeting_duration“ slúži na určenie toho, či ide o celodennú schôdzu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1221">**is_all_day** - Used along with "meeting_duration" to specify if this is an all-day meeting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1222">Pomáha pochopiť, či sa vyskytli nejaké problémy s akciami vykonanými počas celodenných schôdzí.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1222">Helps us understand if there are any issues with actions performed on all-day meetings.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1223">**is_location_permission_granted** – či používateľ aplikácii udelil povolenie na systémové umiestnenie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1223">**is_location_permission_granted** – Whether user has granted system location permission to the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1224">Ak je povolenie na umiestnenie udelené, aplikácia môže v používateľskom rozhraní zobraziť ďalšie informácie o pomôckach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1224">If location permission is granted, the app can show extra utility information in the user interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1225">Keď vieme, či bolo povolenie na umiestnenie udelené, umožňuje nám to zistiť, ako často sa používateľom zobrazujú ďalšie informácie o pomôckach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1225">Knowing if location permission is granted will allow us to know how often the extra utility information is being shown to users.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1226">**is_organizer** – pomáha pochopiť, či organizátor dokáže správne upravovať a vytvárať schôdze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1226">**is_organizer** - Helps us understand if meetings are able to be edited and created by the organizer correctly.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1227">**is_recurring** – pomáha pochopiť, či sa vyskytol problém, ktorý ovplyvňuje konkrétne opakované schôdze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1227">**is_recurring** - Helps us understand if there is an issue that specifically impacts recurring meetings.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1228">**launch_point** – spúšťací bod akcie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1228">**launch_point** - The launch point of the action.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1229">Môže ísť o hodnoty ako napríklad hlavička miniaplikácie, päta miniaplikácie, celodenná miniaplikácia a klávesová skratka kalendára.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1229">Can be values such as widget header, widget footer, widget all day, and calendar shortcut.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1230">Pomáha pochopiť kontext, v ktorom sa akcia spustila.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1230">Helps us understand the context that the action was started from.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1231">**location_count** – počet umiestnení, ktoré sú nastavené pri vytvorení a upravení udalosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1231">**location_count** - Number of locations that are set on event create and edit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1232">Pomáha pochopiť, či sa vyskytli nejaké problémy s vytvorením alebo úpravou udalostí s určitým počtom umiestnení.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1232">Helps us understand if there are any issues with creating or editing events with a certain number of locations.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1233">**location_selection_source_type** – typ zdroja výberu umiestnenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1233">**location_selection_source_type** - Type of the location selection source.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1234">Môže ísť o hodnoty ako napríklad návrh na umiestnenie, vlastné a existujúce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1234">This can include values such as location suggestion, custom, and existing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1235">Pomáha diagnostikovať všetky problémy s výberom umiestnenia z určitého zdroja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1235">Helps us diagnose any issues with selecting a location from a certain source.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1236">**location_session_id** – ID relácie výberu umiestnenia schôdze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1236">**location_session_id** - ID of the meeting location chooser session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1237">Pomáha diagnostikovať všetky problémy s výberom umiestnenia na pridanie do schôdze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1237">Helps us diagnose any issues with choosing a location to add to the meeting.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1238">**location_type** – typ vybraného umiestnenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1238">**location_type** - The type of location selected.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1239">Obsahuje typy ako napríklad vlastné umiestnenie, konferenčná miestnosť a Bing.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1239">Contains types such as custom location, conference room, and Bing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1240">Pomáha pochopiť problémy s pridaním určitých typov umiestnení do schôdze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1240">Helps us understand issues with adding certain location types to the meeting.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1241">**meeting_duration** – dĺžka schôdze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1241">**meeting_duration** - The length of the meeting.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1242">Pomáha zabezpečiť, aby mali schôdze nakonfigurované správne časy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1242">Helps us make sure that the meetings are being configured with the correct times.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1243">**meeting_insights_type** – typ prehľadov schôdze v podrobnostiach o udalosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1243">**meeting_insights_type** - The type of meeting insights in the event details.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1244">Patria sem súbor a správa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1244">This includes file and message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1245">Pomáha pochopiť počet zobrazovaných prehľadov schôdze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1245">Helps us understand the number of meeting insights that are being shown.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1246">**meeting_type** – typ online schôdze priradenej k akcii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1246">**meeting_type** - The type of online meeting associated with the action.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1247">Patrí sem napríklad Skype, Skype for Business, Hangouts a Teams for Business.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1247">This includes types of Skype, Skype for Business, Hangout, and Teams for Business.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-1248">Pomáha zistiť, či sú online schôdze správne nakonfigurované.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-1248">Helps us understand if the online meetings are configured correctly.</span></span>
