#### <a name="officepowerpointdocoperationsave"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-4052">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.Save</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4052">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.Save</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-4053">Zhromažďuje sa vždy, keď PowerPoint vykoná uloženie pomocou cesty moderného kódu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4053">Collected whenever PowerPoint performs a save using the modern code path.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4054">Zahŕňa typ výsledku úspešnosti alebo zlyhania pre metriku výkonu pri ukladaní a metaúdaje relevantného dokumentu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4054">Includes success or failure result type of save performance metrics and relevant document metadata.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4055">Zlyhania uloženia môžu mať za následok stratu údajov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4055">Failures in save can result in data loss.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4056">Spoločnosť Microsoft používa tieto údaje, aby sa zabezpečilo fungovanie funkcie podľa očakávaní a obsah používateľa sa úspešne zachoval.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4056">Microsoft uses this data to ensure the feature is working as expected and user content is successfully being persisted.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-4057">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4057">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4058">**Data\_AddDocTelemetryResult:long** – obsahuje tento záznam denníka celú potrebnú telemetriu dokumentu (polia Data\_Doc\_\*)?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4058">**Data\_AddDocTelemetryResult:long -** Does this log entry have all necessary document telemetry (Data\_Doc\_\* fields)?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4059">Ak nie, prečo?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4059">If not, why?</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4060">**Data\_BeforeSaveEvent:long** – časový úsek, po ktorom nastala udalosť dokumentu pred uložením</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4060">**Data\_BeforeSaveEvent:long -** Time taken to raise Document Before Save Event</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4061">**Data\_CheckDownRevSaveTimeMS:long** – čas potrebný na kontrolu revízie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4061">**Data\_CheckDownRevSaveTimeMS:long -** Time taken to check revision</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4062">**Data\_CheckMacroSaveTimeMS:long** – čas potrebný na uloženie makier</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4062">**Data\_CheckMacroSaveTimeMS:long -** Time taken to save macros</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4063">**Data\_ClearAutoSaveTimeMS:long** – čas potrebný na vymazanie príznaku automatického ukladania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4063">**Data\_ClearAutoSaveTimeMS:long -** Time taken to clear AutoSave flag</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4064">**Data\_ClearDirtyFlagTimeMS:long** – čas potrebný na vymazanie príznaku zmeneného dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4064">**Data\_ClearDirtyFlagTimeMS:long -** Time taken to clear document dirty flag</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4065">**Data\_CloneDocumentTimeMS:long** – čas potrebný na klonovanie dokumentu pred spustením ukladania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4065">**Data\_CloneDocumentTimeMS:long -** Time taken to clone document before starting the save</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4066">**Data_ClpDocHasDrmDoc:bool** – označuje, či dokument obsahuje dokument DRM</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4066">**Data_ClpDocHasDrmDoc:bool** - Whether the document has a DRM document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4067">**Data_ClpDocHasIdentity:bool** – označuje, či dokument má informácie o identite (používajú sa na získanie a nastavenie označení citlivosti)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4067">**Data_ClpDocHasIdentity:bool**  - Whether the document has identity info (used to get and set sensitivity labels)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4068">**Data_ClpDocHasSessionMetadata:bool** – označuje, či dokument má funkčné metaúdaje označenia citlivosti z relácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4068">**Data_ClpDocHasSessionMetadata:bool** – Whether the document has working sensitivity label metadata from the session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4069">**Data_ClpDocHasSpoMetadata:bool** – označuje, či dokument má metaúdaje označenia citlivosti zo SPO prostredníctvom IMetadataCache</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4069">**Data_ClpDocHasSpoMetadata:bool** - Whether the document has sensitivity label metadata from SPO via IMetadataCache</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4070">**Data_ClpDocHasSpoPackage:bool** – označuje, či dokument má metaúdaje označenia citlivosti zo SPO prostredníctvom IPackage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4070">**Data_ClpDocHasSpoPackage:bool** – Whether the document has sensitivity label metadata from SPO via IPackage</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4071">**Data_ClpDocIsProtected:bool** – označuje, či je dokument chránený technológiou IRM</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4071">**Data_ClpDocIsProtected:bool** - Whether or not the document is protected by IRM</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4072">**Data_ClpDocMetadataSource:int** – Enumerácia určujúca, odkiaľ pochádzajú metaúdaje označenia citlivosti (IRM, časť OPC, SharePoint atď.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4072">**Data_ClpDocMetadataSource:int** - Enum specifying where sensitivity label metadata is from (IRM, OPC part, Sharepoint etc)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4073">**Data_ClpDocNeedsUpconversion:bool** – určuje či dokument vyžaduje konverziu údajov označení citlivosti z časti custom.xml</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4073">**Data_ClpDocNeedsUpconversion:bool** - Whether the document needs to upconvert sensitivity label data from the custom.xml part</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4074">**Data_ClpDocNumFailedSetLabels:int** – počet označení citlivosti, ktoré sa v dokumente nepodarilo nastaviť</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4074">**Data_ClpDocNumFailedSetLabels:int** - Count of sensitivity labels that failed to set on the document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4075">**Data_ClpDocSessionMetadataDirty:bool** – označuje, či dokument má funkčné metaúdaje označenia citlivosti, ktoré boli zmenené</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4075">**Data_ClpDocSessionMetadataDirty:bool** - Whether the document has working sensitivity label metadata that has been dirtied</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4076">**Data_ClpDocWasInTrustBoundary:bool** – označuje, či bol dokument v hranici dôveryhodnosti (čo umožňuje spolutvorbu v dokumentoch chránených označeniami citlivosti)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4076">**Data_ClpDocWasInTrustBoundary:bool** – Whether the document was in the trust boundary (allowing for coauthoring on documents protected by sensitivity labels)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4077">**Data\_CommitTransactionTimeMS:long** – čas potrebný na potvrdenie transakcie uloženia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4077">**Data\_CommitTransactionTimeMS:long -** Time taken to commit the save transaction</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4078">**Data\_CppUncaughtExceptionCount:long** – nezachytené natívne výnimky počas spustenej aktivity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4078">**Data\_CppUncaughtExceptionCount:long -** Uncaught native exceptions while activity was running</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4079">**Data\_DetachedDuration:long** – časový úsek, počas ktorého bola aktivita odpojená/nespustená</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4079">**Data\_DetachedDuration:long -** Time for which Activity was detached/not running</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4080">**Data\_Doc\_AccessMode:long** – ako bol otvorený tento dokument (iba na čítanie | čítanie a zapisovanie)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4080">**Data\_Doc\_AccessMode:long -** How was this document opened (Read only | read write)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4081">**Data\_Doc\_AssistedReadingReasons:long** – preddefinovaná množina hodnôt, prečo bol dokument otvorený v režime čítania s asistenciou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4081">**Data\_Doc\_AssistedReadingReasons:long -** Predefined set of values of why document was opened in assisted reading mode</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4082">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind:long** – označuje, či bola otvorená verzia cloudového dokumentu uložená vo vyrovnávacej pamäti a ktorá logika asynchrónneho obnovenia sa použila.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4082">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind:long –** Indicates whether a cached version of the cloud document was opened and which asynchronous refresh logic was used.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4083">**Data\_Doc\_ChunkingType:long** – ako je dokument uložený v SharePointe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4083">**Data\_Doc\_ChunkingType:long -** How is document stored in SharePoint</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4084">**Data\_Doc\_EdpState:long** – stav ochrany podnikových údajov v dokumente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4084">**Data\_Doc\_EdpState:long -** Enterprise Data Protection state of document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4085">**Data\_Doc\_Ext:string** – prípona dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4085">**Data\_Doc\_Ext:string -** Document extension</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4086">**Data\_Doc\_Extension:string** – prípona dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4086">**Data\_Doc\_Extension:string -** Document extension</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4087">**Data\_Doc\_FileFormat:long** – preddefinovaná množina hodnôt formátu súboru (podrobnejšie ako prípona)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4087">**Data\_Doc\_FileFormat:long -** Predefined set of values of format of file (more granular than extension)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4088">**Data\_Doc\_Fqdn:string** – kde je dokument uložený (SharePoint.com, live.net), k dispozícii len pre domény v Office 365</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4088">**Data\_Doc\_Fqdn:string -** Where is document stored (SharePoint.com, live.net), only available for Office 365 domains</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4089">**Data\_Doc\_FqdnHash:string** – hodnota hash miesta uloženia dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4089">**Data\_Doc\_FqdnHash:string -** Hash of where document is stored</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4090">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityTelemetryId:string** – jedinečný identifikátor GUID používateľa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4090">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityTelemetryId:string -** Unique GUID of user</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4091">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityUniqueId:string** – jedinečný identifikátor identity, ktorý sa použil pre akciu zdieľaných dokumentov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4091">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityUniqueId:string -** Unique identifier of identity that was used for Shared Documents action</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4092">**Data\_Doc\_IOFlags:long** – bitová maska pre rôzne príznaky súvisiace s OI pre daný dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4092">**Data\_Doc\_IOFlags:long -** Bitmask for various IO-related flags for a given document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4093">**Data\_Doc\_IrmRights:long** – preddefinovaná množina hodnôt toho, aký typ správy prístupových práv k informáciám je použitý v tomto dokumente (preposielanie, odpovedanie, SecureReader, úpravy atď.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4093">**Data\_Doc\_IrmRights:long -** Predefined set of values of what type of Information Rights Management is applied on this document (Forward, Reply, SecureReader, Edit etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4094">**Data\_Doc\_IsCloudCollabEnabled:bool** – hodnota je True, ak už bola prijatá hlavička protokolu HTTP „IsCloudCollabEnabled“ z požiadavky na OPTIONS (Možnosti).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4094">**Data\_Doc\_IsCloudCollabEnabled:bool -** True if the "IsCloudCollabEnabled" HTTP header has already been received from an OPTIONS request.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4095">**Data\_Doc\_IsIncrementalOpen:bool** – či bol dokument otvorený prírastkovo (novou funkciou, ktorá otvorí dokument bez potreby stiahnuť celý dokument)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4095">**Data\_Doc\_IsIncrementalOpen:bool -** Was document opened incrementally (new feature that opens document without needing to download entire document)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4096">**Data\_Doc\_IsOcsSupported:bool** – či dokument podporuje spoluautorstvo pomocou novej služby OCS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4096">**Data\_Doc\_IsOcsSupported:bool -** Is Document supports co-authoring using new OCS service</span></span>

#### <a name="officepowerpointdocoperationsaveas"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-4149">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.SaveAs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4149">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.SaveAs</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-4150">Zhromažďuje sa vždy, keď PowerPoint vykoná akciu Uložiť ako.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4150">Collected whenever PowerPoint performs a Save As.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4151">Zahŕňa typ výsledku úspešnosti alebo zlyhania pre metriku výkonu pri ukladaní a metaúdaje relevantného dokumentu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4151">Includes success or failure result type of save performance metrics and relevant document metadata.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4152">Zlyhania uloženia môžu mať za následok stratu údajov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4152">Failures in save can result in data loss.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4153">Spoločnosť Microsoft používa tieto údaje, aby sa zabezpečilo fungovanie funkcie podľa očakávaní a obsah používateľa sa úspešne zachoval.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4153">Microsoft uses this data to ensure the feature is working as expected and user content is successfully being persisted.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-4154">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4154">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4155">**Data_AddDocTelemetryResult:long** – obsahuje tento záznam denníka celú potrebnú telemetriu dokumentu (polia Data_Doc_\*)?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4155">**Data_AddDocTelemetryResult:long** - Does this log entry have all necessary document telemetry (Data_Doc_\* fields)?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4156">Ak nie, prečo?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4156">If not, why?</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4157">**Data_ClpDocHasDrmDoc:bool** – označuje, či dokument obsahuje dokument DRM</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4157">**Data_ClpDocHasDrmDoc:bool** - Whether the document has a DRM document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4158">**Data_ClpDocHasIdentity:bool** – označuje, či dokument má informácie o identite (používajú sa na získanie a nastavenie označení citlivosti)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4158">**Data_ClpDocHasIdentity:bool**  - Whether the document has identity info (used to get and set sensitivity labels)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4159">**Data_ClpDocHasSessionMetadata:bool** – označuje, či dokument má funkčné metaúdaje označenia citlivosti z relácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4159">**Data_ClpDocHasSessionMetadata:bool** – Whether the document has working sensitivity label metadata from the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4160">**Data_ClpDocHasSpoMetadata:bool** – označuje, či dokument má metaúdaje označenia citlivosti zo SPO prostredníctvom IMetadataCache</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4160">**Data_ClpDocHasSpoMetadata:bool** - Whether the document has sensitivity label metadata from SPO via IMetadataCache</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4161">**Data_ClpDocHasSpoPackage:bool** – označuje, či dokument má metaúdaje označenia citlivosti zo SPO prostredníctvom IPackage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4161">**Data_ClpDocHasSpoPackage:bool** – Whether the document has sensitivity label metadata from SPO via IPackage</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4162">**Data_ClpDocIsProtected:bool** – označuje, či je dokument chránený technológiou IRM</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4162">**Data_ClpDocIsProtected:bool** - Whether or not the document is protected by IRM</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4163">**Data_ClpDocMetadataSource:int** – Enumerácia určujúca, odkiaľ pochádzajú metaúdaje označenia citlivosti (IRM, časť OPC, SharePoint atď.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4163">**Data_ClpDocMetadataSource:int** - Enum specifying where sensitivity label metadata is from (IRM, OPC part, Sharepoint etc)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4164">**Data_ClpDocNeedsUpconversion:bool** – určuje či dokument vyžaduje konverziu údajov označení citlivosti z časti custom.xml</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4164">**Data_ClpDocNeedsUpconversion:bool** - Whether the document needs to upconvert sensitivity label data from the custom.xml part</span></span>

#### <a name="officepowerpointdocoperationsavelegacy"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-4260">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.SaveLegacy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4260">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.SaveLegacy</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-4261">Zhromažďuje sa vždy, keď PowerPoint vykoná uloženie pomocou cesty staršieho kódu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4261">Collected whenever PowerPoint performs a save using the legacy code path.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4262">Zahŕňa typ výsledku úspešnosti alebo zlyhania pre metriku výkonu pri ukladaní a metaúdaje relevantného dokumentu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4262">Includes success or failure result type of save performance metrics and relevant document metadata.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4263">Zlyhania uloženia môžu mať za následok stratu údajov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4263">Failures in save can result in data loss.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4264">Spoločnosť Microsoft používa tieto údaje, aby sa zabezpečilo fungovanie funkcie podľa očakávaní a obsah používateľa sa úspešne zachoval.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4264">Microsoft uses this data to ensure the feature is working as expected and user content is successfully being persisted.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-4265">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4265">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4266">**Data_AddDocTelemetryResult:long** – obsahuje tento záznam denníka celú potrebnú telemetriu dokumentu (polia Data_Doc_\*)?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4266">**Data_AddDocTelemetryResult:long** - Does this log entry have all necessary document telemetry (Data_Doc_\* fields)?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4267">Ak nie, prečo?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4267">If not, why?</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4268">**Data_ClpDocHasDrmDoc:bool** – označuje, či dokument obsahuje dokument DRM</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4268">**Data_ClpDocHasDrmDoc:bool** - Whether the document has a DRM document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4269">**Data_ClpDocHasIdentity:bool** – označuje, či dokument má informácie o identite (používajú sa na získanie a nastavenie označení citlivosti)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4269">**Data_ClpDocHasIdentity:bool**  - Whether the document has identity info (used to get and set sensitivity labels)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4270">**Data_ClpDocHasSessionMetadata:bool** – označuje, či dokument má funkčné metaúdaje označenia citlivosti z relácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4270">**Data_ClpDocHasSessionMetadata:bool** – Whether the document has working sensitivity label metadata from the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4271">**Data_ClpDocHasSpoMetadata:bool** – označuje, či dokument má metaúdaje označenia citlivosti zo SPO prostredníctvom IMetadataCache</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4271">**Data_ClpDocHasSpoMetadata:bool** - Whether the document has sensitivity label metadata from SPO via IMetadataCache</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4272">**Data_ClpDocHasSpoPackage:bool** – označuje, či dokument má metaúdaje označenia citlivosti zo SPO prostredníctvom IPackage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4272">**Data_ClpDocHasSpoPackage:bool** – Whether the document has sensitivity label metadata from SPO via IPackage</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4273">**Data_ClpDocIsProtected:bool** – označuje, či je dokument chránený technológiou IRM</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4273">**Data_ClpDocIsProtected:bool** - Whether or not the document is protected by IRM</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4274">**Data_ClpDocMetadataSource:int** – Enumerácia určujúca, odkiaľ pochádzajú metaúdaje označenia citlivosti (IRM, časť OPC, SharePoint atď.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4274">**Data_ClpDocMetadataSource:int** - Enum specifying where sensitivity label metadata is from (IRM, OPC part, Sharepoint etc)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4275">**Data_ClpDocNeedsUpconversion:bool** – určuje či dokument vyžaduje konverziu údajov označení citlivosti z časti custom.xml</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4275">**Data_ClpDocNeedsUpconversion:bool** - Whether the document needs to upconvert sensitivity label data from the custom.xml part</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4277">**Data_ClpDocSessionMetadataDirty:bool** – označuje, či dokument má funkčné metaúdaje označenia citlivosti, ktoré boli zmenené</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4277">**Data_ClpDocSessionMetadataDirty:bool** - Whether the document has working sensitivity label metadata that has been dirtied</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4278">**Data_ClpDocWasInTrustBoundary:bool** – označuje, či bol dokument v hranici dôveryhodnosti (čo umožňuje spolutvorbu v dokumentoch chránených označeniami citlivosti)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4278">**Data_ClpDocWasInTrustBoundary:bool** – Whether the document was in the trust boundary (allowing for coauthoring on documents protected by sensitivity labels)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4281">**Data_Doc_AccessMode:long** – ako bol otvorený tento dokument (iba na čítanie | čítanie a zapisovanie).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4281">**Data_Doc_AccessMode:long** - How was this document opened (Read only | read write)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4282">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons:long** – preddefinovaná množina hodnôt, prečo bol dokument otvorený v režime čítania s asistenciou.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4282">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons:long** - Predefined set of values of why document was opened in assisted reading mode</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4283">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind:long** – označuje, či bola otvorená verzia cloudového dokumentu uložená vo vyrovnávacej pamäti a ktorá logika asynchrónneho obnovenia sa použila.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4283">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind:long –** Indicates whether a cached version of the cloud document was opened and which asynchronous refresh logic was used.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4294">**Data_Doc_IrmRights:long** – preddefinovaná množina hodnôt toho, aký typ správy prístupových práv k informáciám je použitý v tomto dokumente (preposielanie, odpovedanie, SecureReader, úpravy atď.).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4294">**Data_Doc_IrmRights:long** - Predefined set of values of what type of Information Rights Management is applied on this document (Forward, Reply, SecureReader, Edit etc.)</span></span>

#### <a name="officepowerpointpptiosrehearseview"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-4409">Office.PowerPoint.PPT.IOS.RehearseView</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4409">Office.PowerPoint.PPT.IOS.RehearseView</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-4410">Táto udalosť označuje, že používateľ ukončil reláciu skúšky.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4410">This event is denoting that user has stopped the rehearsal session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4411">Údaje sa používajú v kombinácii s Office.PowerPoint.IOS.Android.RehearseView.StartSession ako indikátor akéhokoľvek zlyhania alebo chyby, ktorým používateľ čelí.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4411">The data is used in combination with Office.PowerPoint.IOS.Android.RehearseView.StartSession as the first indicator of any crashes or errors that user faces.</span></span>  
 
<span data-ttu-id="b136d-4412">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4412">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4413">**ConnectionCreationTime** – čas na vytvorenie bočných pripojení k služby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4413">**ConnectionCreationTime** - time taken to create service side connections.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4414">**CountDownAlertTime** – čas, pre ktorý sa zobrazilo upozornenie na odpočítavanie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4414">**CountDownAlertTime** - Time for which countdown alert was displayed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4415">**CountdownInitTime –** – čas medzi dokončením načítania prezentácie a spustením odpočítavania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4415">**CountdownInitTime** – Time between slideshow load completed and countdown started.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4416">**CritiqueSummary** – Súhrn toho, čo všetci kritici videli, spolu s ich počtami.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4416">**CritiqueSummary** - Summary of what all critiques user saw with their counts.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4417">**ExitEventCode** – kód na identifikáciu toho, v ktorom scenári používateľ ukončil skúšobnú reláciu, či išlo o chybový scenár, alebo úspešné ukončenie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4417">**ExitEventCode** - Code to identify under which scenario user exit out of rehearse session, whether it was error scenario or successful exit</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4418">**FRETime** – čas od začatia zobrazovania obrazovky FRE, kým ju používateľ nezrušil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4418">**FRETime** - Time between FRE screen started to display until user dismissed it.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4419">**MicrophonePermissionTime** – čas, pre ktorý sa zobrazilo upozornenie na povolenie mikrofónu, kým používateľ nevybral niektorú z možností.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4419">**MicrophonePermissionTime** - Time for which microphone permission alert was displayed until user selected one of the options.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4420">**ResumeRehearsingCount** – počet kliknutí používateľa na pozastavenie skúšky.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4420">**PauseRehearsingCount** - Count of how many times user clicked on pause rehearsal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4421">**RehearsalInitTime** – čas potrebný na inicializáciu skúšky.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4421">**RehearsalInitTime** - Time taken by rehearsal to initialize</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4422">**ResumeRehearsingCount** – počet kliknutí používateľa na pokračovanie v skúške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4422">**ResumeRehearsingCount** - Count of how many times user clicked on resume rehearsal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4423">**Sessionid** – Identifikátor relácie reči.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4423">**Sessionid** - This is speech front door session ID.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4424">Používa sa na ladenie denníkov služby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4424">This is used to debug service logs.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4425">**SlideshowViewLoadTime** – čas potrebný na načítanie prezentácie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4425">**SlideshowViewLoadTime** - Time taken by slideshow to load.</span></span>


#### <a name="officepowerpointpptiosrehearseviewrehearsalsummarypage"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-4426">Office.PowerPoint.PPT.IOS.RehearseView.RehearsalSummaryPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4426">Office.PowerPoint.PPT.IOS.RehearseView.RehearsalSummaryPage</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-4427">Udalosť sa spustí po dokončení načítania stránky súhrnu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4427">Event is triggered when summary page has finished loading.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4428">Táto udalosť nám pomáha pri zachytávaní výkonu stránky súhrnu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4428">This event helps us capture the performance of the summary page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4429">Poskytuje nám informácie o tom, koľko času trvá načítanie stránky služby súhrnu skúšky na klientskom počítači.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4429">It tells how much time it takes for the rehearsal summary service page to load on the client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4430">Je potrebná na udržanie výkonu funkcie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4430">It is required to keep the feature performant.</span></span>  

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-4431">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4431">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4432">**PayloadCreationTime** – čas v milisekundách, ktorý bol potrebný na vytvorenie údajovej časti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4432">**PayloadCreationTime** - This is the time taken in milliseconds to create payload.</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4433">**PostUrlCallTime** – čas v milisekundách, ktorý bol potrebný na odoslanie volania po URL adrese.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4433">**PostUrlCallTime** - This is the time taken in milliseconds to send the post URL call.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4434">**RehearseSessionId** – identifikátor relácie reči.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4434">**RehearseSessionId** - This is speech front door session ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4435">Môžeme ho použiť na ladenie denníkov služby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4435">We can use this to debug service logs.</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4436">**SummaryPageErrorReceived** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či bola prijatá stránka súhrnu alebo sa vyskytla chyba.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4436">**SummaryPageErrorReceived** - This is a Boolean value that indicates if summary page was received or error occurred.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4437">**SummaryPageHtmlLoadTime** – čas v milisekundách, ktorý bol potrebný na načítanie html stránky súhrnu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4437">**SummaryPageHtmlLoadTime** - This is the time taken in milliseconds to load summarypageHtml.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4438">**SummaryPageHtmlLoadTime** – čas v milisekundách, ktorý bol potrebný na prijatie prvej odpovede zo servera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4438">**SummaryPageLoadStartTime** - This is the time taken in milliseconds receive first response from the server.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4439">**SummaryPageLoadTime** – trvanie (v ms) načítania stránky súhrnu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4439">**SummaryPageLoadTime** - Time taken to load summary page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4440">Zahŕňa čas vytvárania údajovej časti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4440">This includes payload creation time.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4441">**ThumbnailsCount** – celkový počet miniatúr, ktoré budú súčasťou stránky súhrnu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4441">**ThumbnailsCount** - This is the total number of thumbnails that will be part of summary page.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4522">**DataSource_Name** – názov pripojeného zdroja údajov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4522">**DataSource_Name** - Name of connected data source</span></span>

#### <a name="officetargetedmessagingabexperimentmessagetrigger"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-4527">Office.TargetedMessaging.ABExperimentMessageTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4527">Office.TargetedMessaging.ABExperimentMessageTrigger</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-4528">Sleduje počet používateľov, ktorí prijímajú správy BizBar a správy dynamického plátna zo služby TargetedMessagingService (TMS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4528">Tracks the number of users receiving BizBar and Dynamic Canvas messages from TargetedMessagingService (TMS).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4529">Tieto údaje sú veľmi dôležité pri zisťovaní, aké správy používatelia dostávajú a na akom povrchu, aby sme mohli zabezpečiť, že dostanú všetky správy, ktoré pre nich môžu byť dôležité v súvislosti s ďalším používaním produktu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4529">This data is critical to understand what messages users are getting and on what surface so that we can ensure they are not missing any messages that may be critical to their continued use of the product.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4530">Tiež sú potrebné na presné meranie úspešnosti našich experimentov a kampaní spustených prostredníctvom TMS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4530">Also needed to accurately measure the success of our experiments and campaigns run through TMS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-4531">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4531">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4532">**Data\_Surface** – názov povrchu, pre ktorý je táto správa doručená službou určená</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4532">**Data\_Surface** – Name of the surface that this service delivered message is meant for</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4533">**Data\_Flight** – identifikátor skupiny funkcií ECS/CT, ktorý sa použil na doručenie tejto správy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4533">**Data\_Flight** – ECS/CT Flight identifier that was used to deliver this message</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4534">**Data\_CampaignId** – identifikátor kampane, ktorej je táto správa súčasťou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4534">**Data\_CampaignId** – identifier of the campaign that this message is part of</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4535">**Data\_MessageId** – identifikátor tejto správy doručenej službou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4535">**Data\_MessageId** – identifier of this service delivered message</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4536">**Data\_TransactionId** – identifikátor tejto transakcie so službou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4536">**Data\_TransactionId** – identifier of this transaction with the service</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4537">**Data\_TriggerPoint** – krok, v ktorom bola táto udalosť zaznamenaná (prijatie správy, zobrazenie správy)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4537">**Data\_TriggerPoint** – The step in which this event was logged (message received vs message displayed)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-4614">Zhromažďuje informácie o úspešnosti alebo zlyhaní prekladu výberu, ktorý sa spustí akciou používateľa v službe Translator SDX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4614">Collects success or failure of a selection translation that a user action triggers in the Translator SDX.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4615">Je to veľmi dôležité na vyhodnotenie stavu funkcie prekladača a reagovanie na všetky výpadky, ktoré sa môžu vyskytnúť.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4615">This is critical to evaluate the health of the translation feature and react to any outages that might occur.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4616">Používa na monitorovanie stavu scenára „Preložiť vybratý text“ v Exceli, v PowerPointe a vo Word.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4616">Used to monitor the health of the "Translate Selection" scenario in Excel, PowerPoint, Word.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeuxacccheckeracccheckerfinalviolationcountperrule"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-4670">Office.UX.AccChecker.AccCheckerFinalViolationCountPerRule</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4670">Office.UX.AccChecker.AccCheckerFinalViolationCountPerRule</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-4671">Táto udalosť sa spustí, keď sa pre aktuálne otvorený dokument oznamujú problémy so zjednodušením ovládania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4671">This event is triggered when Accessibility issues are reported for the currently opened document.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4672">Táto udalosť predstavuje porušenia zjednodušenia ovládania (chyby, upozornenia a tipy), ktoré existujú pre jednotlivé pravidlá pre otvorený dokument na začiatku a na konci relácie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4672">This event represents the Accessibility violations (Errors, Warnings, and Tips) that exist per Rule, for the opened document at the beginning and end of the session.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4673">Táto udalosť sa používa na zaznamenanie počtov porušení zjednodušenia ovládania (chyby, upozornenia a tipy) pre jednotlivé pravidlá pre otvorený dokument na začiatku a na konci relácie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4673">This event is used to record the counts of Accessibility violations (Errors, Warnings, and Tips) per Rule, for the opened document at the beginning and end of the session.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-4674">Podrobnosti o počtoch porušení pre jednotlivé pravidlá pomáhajú spoločnosti Microsoft zistiť, ktoré problémy so zjednodušeným ovládaním sú najbežnejšie v dokumentoch balíka Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4674">Details of violation counts per rule help Microsoft to identify which Accessibility issues are most common in Office documents.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4675">Pomáha to pri práci na ich odstraňovaní a podporuje to vytváranie inkluzívneho prostredia na pracoviskách a v triedach pre osoby s postihnutím.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4675">This helps with work on remediating them and drives the creation of an inclusive environment in the workplace and classroom for people with disabilities.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-4676">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4676">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4677">**Data_FinalCount_RuleID_0** – počet porušení ID pravidla = n, ktoré zostali pri poslednom spustení kontroly zjednodušenia ovládania v relácii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4677">**Data_FinalCount_RuleID_0** - Number of violations of Rule ID = n that remain the last time the acc checker ran in a session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4678">**Data_FinalCount_RuleID_1** – počet porušení ID pravidla = n, ktoré zostali pri poslednom spustení kontroly zjednodušenia ovládania v relácii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4678">**Data_FinalCount_RuleID_1** - Number of violations of Rule ID = n that remain the last time the acc checker ran in a session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4679">**Data_FinalCount_RuleID_2** – počet porušení ID pravidla = n, ktoré zostali pri poslednom spustení kontroly zjednodušenia ovládania v relácii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4679">**Data_FinalCount_RuleID_2** - Number of violations of Rule ID = n that remain the last time the acc checker ran in a session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4680">**Data_FinalCount_RuleID_3** – počet porušení ID pravidla = n, ktoré zostali pri poslednom spustení kontroly zjednodušenia ovládania v relácii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4680">**Data_FinalCount_RuleID_3** - Number of violations of Rule ID = n that remain the last time the acc checker ran in a session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4681">**Data_FinalCount_RuleID_4** – počet porušení ID pravidla = n, ktoré zostali pri poslednom spustení kontroly zjednodušenia ovládania v relácii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4681">**Data_FinalCount_RuleID_4** - Number of violations of Rule ID = n that remain the last time the acc checker ran in a session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4682">**Data_FinalCount_RuleID_5** – počet porušení ID pravidla = n, ktoré zostali pri poslednom spustení kontroly zjednodušenia ovládania v relácii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4682">**Data_FinalCount_RuleID_5** - Number of violations of Rule ID = n that remain the last time the acc checker ran in a session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4683">**Data_FinalCount_RuleID_6** – počet porušení ID pravidla = n, ktoré zostali pri poslednom spustení kontroly zjednodušenia ovládania v relácii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4683">**Data_FinalCount_RuleID_6** - Number of violations of Rule ID = n that remain the last time the acc checker ran in a session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-4684">**Data_FinalCount_RuleID_7** – počet porušení ID pravidla = n, ktoré zostali pri poslednom spustení kontroly zjednodušenia ovládania v relácii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-4684">**Data_FinalCount_RuleID_7** - Number of violations of Rule ID = n that remain the last time the acc checker ran in a session.</span></span>
