#### <a name="jsonparseerror"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7016">json.parse.error</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7016">json.parse.error</span></span> 
 
<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7017">Táto udalosť označuje, že analyzátor JSON vyhodil chybu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7017">This event denotes that an error is thrown by the json parser.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7018">Budeme môcť vyriešiť problém s reťazcom načítania databázy Registry, ktorý bol odoslaný do analyzátora JSON, aby sa pre používateľov zabezpečila plynulá skúsenosť.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7018">We will be able to debug the read registry string that was sent to the json parser, to allow a smooth experience for our users.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7019">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7019">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7020">**Error** – Obsahuje chybové hlásenie, že sa vracia objekt chyby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7020">**Error** - This consists of the error message that the error object returns.</span></span>

#### <a name="mailfiltercomponent"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7021">mail.filter.component</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7021">mail.filter.component</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7022">Táto udalosť umožňuje zistiť a vyriešiť problémy, ktoré citeľne vplývajú na výkon filtrovania pošty, čo by malo za následok nesprávne načítanie alebo zobrazenie filtrov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7022">This event lets us detect and fix issues where there is perceivable performance impact on your mail filtering experience, which would cause your filters to not load or display properly.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7023">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7023">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7024">**above_40fps** – počet snímok vykreslených nad 40 fps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7024">**above_40fps** - count of frames rendered above 40 fps</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7025">**above_40fps** – počet snímok vykreslených nad 40 fps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7025">**above_40rate** - radio of frames rendered above 40 fps</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7026">**above_50fps** – počet snímok vykreslených nad 50 fps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7026">**above_50fps** - count of frames rendered above 50 fps</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7027">**above_50fps** – počet snímok vykreslených nad 50 fps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7027">**above_50rate** - radio of frames rendered above 50 fps</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7028">**above_55fps** – počet snímok vykreslených nad 55 fps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7028">**above_55fps** - count of frames rendered above 55 fps</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7029">**above_55fps** – počet snímok vykreslených nad 55 fps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7029">**above_55rate** - radio of frames rendered above 55 fps</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7030">**account_counter** – počet každého typu konta v zariadení, napríklad konto služieb Office 365 = 1 konto, konto Outlook.com = 1 konto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7030">**account_counter** - count of each account type present on the device, for example, an Office 365 account = 1 account, Outlook.com account = 1 account.</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7031">**ad_not_shown_reason** – dôvod, prečo sa nezobrazujú reklamy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7031">**ad_not_shown_reason** - reason why ads are not being shown</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7032">**ad_shown** – označuje, či sa zobrazila reklama (ak sú povolené reklamy)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7032">**ad_shown** - whether an add was shown (if ads enabled)</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7033">**age** vek osoby (používa sa na potvrdenie dodržiavania vekových obmedzení reklám)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7033">**age** - age of the person (used to confirm compliance with age limitations on ads)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7034">**app_instance** – Outlook má dva vstupné body pre Duo, jeden je pre kalendár a jeden je pre poštu a oba možno spustiť súbežne v prostredí s viacerými inštanciami.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7034">**app_instance** – Outlook has two entry points for Duo, one is for Calendar and one is for Mail and both can be launched side by side in multi instance environment.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7035">Umožní nám to zistiť, ktorá inštancia vyvolala tento hovor s hlásením (pošta alebo kalendár)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7035">This will let us know which instance is making this reporting call, either Mail or Calendar</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7036">**component_name** – názov súčasti/zobrazenia, ktoré je aktívne počas filtrovania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7036">**component_name** - the name of the component/view that is active during the filtering</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7037">**folder_type** – typ filtrovaného priečinka (napríklad Doručená pošta, Kôš, Nesystémový)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7037">**folder_type** - the type of folder that is being filtered (for example, Inbox, Trash, NonSystem)</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7038">**has_hx** – označuje, či má zariadenie aspoň 1 konto Hx (nová služba na synchronizáciu e-mailov)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7038">**has_hx** - whether the device has at least one Hx (the new email syncing service) account</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7039">**has_subscription** – označuje, či má zariadenie odber reklám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7039">**has_subscription** - whether the device has an ads subscription</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7040">**is_all_accounts_inbox** – označuje, či je aktuálny priečinok doručenej pošty priečinok „všetky kontá“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7040">**is_all_accounts_inbox** - whether the current inbox is the "all accounts" folder</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7041">**is_current_account** – označuje, či je aktuálne aktívne konto kontom reklamy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7041">**is_current_account** - whether the current active account is the ads account</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7042">**load_error_code** – kód chyby pri načítavaní reklám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7042">**load_error_code** - error code when loading ads</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7043">**network_error_code** – kód chyby siete pri žiadosti o reklamy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7043">**network_error_code** - network error code when requesting ads</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7044">**orientation** – orientácia obrazovky v čase udalosti (na výšku alebo na šírku)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7044">**orientation** - the screen orientation at the time of the even (portrait or landscape)</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7045">**sub_error_type** – podrobný typ chyby</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7045">**sub_error_type** - detailed error type</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7046">**taskId** – TaskId nám poskytne taskId aktuálnej inštancie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7046">**taskId** – TaskId will give us the current instance’s taskId.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7047">Táto možnosť sa bude vyžadovať v prostredí s viacerými inštanciami, ak chce používateľ spúšťať rovnaké inštancie (kalendár, kalendár alebo pošta, pošta) vedľa seba</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7047">This will be required in multi instance environment if user wants to launch same instances (Calendar, Calendar or Mail, Mail) side by side</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7048">**total_count** – celkový počet snímok zobrazených súčasťou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7048">**total_count** - total frames displayed by the component</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7049">**view_duration** – ako dlho mal používateľ zobrazenú súčasť</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7049">**view_duration** - how long the component was viewed by the user</span></span>

#### <a name="messagerenderingintercepted"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7050">message.rendering.intercepted</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7050">message.rendering.intercepted</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7051">Táto udalosť nám umožňuje sledovať, ako často používatelia zachytávajú proces vykreslenia ešte pred jeho dokončením.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7051">This event enables us to track how often the users intercept the rendering process before it is completed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7052">Tieto údaje používame na zisťovanie problémov s výkonom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7052">We use this data to detect performance issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7053">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7053">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7054">**is_cache** – či sa telo správy načítalo z vyrovnávacej pamäte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7054">**is_cache** - whether the message body is loaded from cache</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7055">**is_on_screen** – či je proces vykreslenia viditeľný pre používateľov (normálne vykresľovanie)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7055">**is_on_screen** - whether the rendering process is visible to users (normal rendering)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7056">**is_rendering_complete** – či sa proces vykreslenia dokončil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7056">**is_rendering_complete** - whether the rendering process is completed</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7057">**is_trimmed_body** – či je telo správy orezané</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7057">**is_trimmed_body** - whether the message body is trimmed body</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7058">**rendering_method** – spôsob vykreslenia správy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7058">**rendering_method** - the method of rendering message</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7059">**rendering_time** – trvanie vykreslenia správy, kým používateľ neopustí stranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7059">**rendering_time** - the duration of rendering the message until user leaves the page</span></span>

#### <a name="messagerenderingperformance"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7060">message.rendering.performance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7060">message.rendering.performance</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7061">Táto udalosť nám umožňuje monitorovať výkon procesu vykreslenia správy, aby sme mohli analyzovať výkon jednotlivých procesov vykreslenia a rozpoznať problémy s výkonom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7061">This event lets us monitor the performance of the message rendering process, so that we can analyze the performance of different rendering processes and detect performance issues.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7062">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7062">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7063">**bundle_prepare_time** – čas na prípravu zväzku na vykreslenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7063">**bundle_prepare_time** - the time to prepare the bundle for rendering</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7064">**full_rendering_time** – čas procesu úplného vykreslenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7064">**full_rendering_time** - the time of full rendering process</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7065">**is_cache** – či sa telo správy načítalo z vyrovnávacej pamäte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7065">**is_cache** - whether the message body is loaded from cache</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7066">**is_on_screen** – či je proces vykreslenia viditeľný pre používateľov (normálne vykresľovanie)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7066">**is_on_screen** - whether the rendering process is visible to users (normal rendering)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7067">**is_trimmed_body** – či je telo správy orezané</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7067">**is_trimmed_body** - whether the message body is trimmed body</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7068">**load_message_time** – čas na načítanie správy z backendu (môže to byť 0, ak je správa uložená vo vyrovnávacej pamäti)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7068">**load_message_time** - the time to load message from backend (can be 0 if the message has been cached)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7069">**native_preprocess_time** – čas na predbežné spracovanie tela správy na natívnej strane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7069">**native_preprocess_time** - the time to preprocess message body in native side</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7070">**prepare_body_time** – čas na prípravu tela správy (vrátane správy o načítaní a predbežnom spracovaní)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7070">**prepare_body_time** - the time to prepare message body (including load and preprocess message)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7071">**rendering_method** – spôsob vykreslenia správy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7071">**rendering_method** - the method of rendering message</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7072">**rendering_time** – čas vykreslenia správy zväzkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7072">**rendering_time** - the time to render message by the bundle</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7073">**wait_time** – čas na vytvorenie URL adresy správy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7073">**wait_time** - the time to build message URL</span></span>


#### <a name="officeandroidandroidofficelaunchtolandingpagelatency"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7074">Office.Android.AndroidOfficeLaunchToLandingPageLatency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7074">Office.Android.AndroidOfficeLaunchToLandingPageLatency</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7075">Dôležité pri zachytávaní metriky výkonu aplikácie s ohľadom na čas odozvy aplikácie od spustenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7075">Critical to capture for app performance metric with respect to the response time of the app from the boot.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7076">Spoločnosť Microsoft používa túto možnosť na zber času potrebného na odozvu aplikácie a tiež na zisťovanie scenárov, ktoré môžu mať vplyv na čas spustenia v aplikáciách Word, Excel alebo PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7076">Microsoft uses this to collect the time taken for the app to be responsive and also detect scenarios that may impact boot time in Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7077">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7077">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7078">**AnyCrashInteractionDuringBoot** – Boolovská hodnota pre každé zlyhanie, ktoré sa vyskytne počas štartu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7078">**AnyCrashInteractionDuringBoot** - Boolean for any crash encountered during boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7079">**AppActivationTimeInMs** – čas fázy aplikácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7079">**AppActivationTimeInMs** - App phase time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7080">**AppSuspendedDuringBoot** – Boolovská hodnota pre pozastavenie aplikácie počas štartu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7080">**AppSuspendedDuringBoot** - Boolean for app suspension during boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7081">**AvailableMemoryInMB** – dostupná pamäť</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7081">**AvailableMemoryInMB** - available memory</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7082">**CollectionTime** – čas udalosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7082">**CollectionTime** - time of event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7083">**DalvikHeapLimitInMB** – informácie o haldách</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7083">**DalvikHeapLimitInMB** - Heap info</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7084">**DocumentRecoveryInvoked** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či bol nejaký dokument obnovený</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7084">**DocumentRecoveryInvoked** - Boolean to indicate if any document was recovered</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7085">**ExtractionDone** – čas extrakcie natívnej knižnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7085">**ExtractionDone** - Native library extraction time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7086">**FastBootGainTimeInMs** – čas potrebný na dokončenie rýchleho štartu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7086">**FastBootGainTimeInMs** - Time for fast boot completion</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7087">**FileActivationAttempted** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či bolo spustenie aplikácie spôsobené aktiváciou súboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7087">**FileActivationAttempted** - Boolean to indicate if app was launched due to File activation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7088">**HasLogcatLoggingImpactOnBoot** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či logcat ovplyvnil čas štartu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7088">**HasLogcatLoggingImpactOnBoot** - Boolean to indicate if logcat impacted boot time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7089">**IsThisFirstLaunch** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či ide o prvé spustenie aplikácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7089">**IsThisFirstLaunch** - Boolean to indicate if this is first app launch</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7090">**LatencyTimeInMilliSec** – oneskorenie v milisekundách</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7090">**LatencyTimeInMilliSec** - latency in millisecond</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7091">**LibrarySharingTimeInMs** – čas na zdieľanie knižníc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7091">**LibrarySharingTimeInMs** - time for sharing libraries</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7092">**LoadMinLibsTimeInMs** – čas načítania minimálnej množiny knižníc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7092">**LoadMinLibsTimeInMs** - Loading time for the minimum set of libraries</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7093">**MruListingTimeInMs** – čas potrebný na načítanie MRU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7093">**MruListingTimeInMs** - time to load MRU</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7094">**NativeLibrariesLoadTime** – čas načítania knižnice CPP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7094">**NativeLibrariesLoadTime** - CPP library load time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7095">**NumberOfRunningProcesses** – počet spustených procesov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7095">**NumberOfRunningProcesses** - number of running processes</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7096">**NumberOfRunningProcesses** – počet spustených procesov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7096">**NumberOfRunningProcesses** - Number of running processes</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7097">**NumberOfRunningServices** – počet spustených služieb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7097">**NumberOfRunningServices** - Number of running services</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7098">**OfficeActivityTimeInMs** – čas na inicializáciu OfficeActivity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7098">**OfficeActivityTimeInMs** - Time for initing OfficeActivity</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7099">**PostAppInitTimeInMs** – čas fázy aplikácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7099">**PostAppInitTimeInMs** - app phase time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7100">**PreAppInitializationTime** – čas inicializácie fázy aplikácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7100">**PreAppInitializationTime** - App phase init time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7101">**PreAppInitTimeInMs** – čas fázy aplikácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7101">**PreAppInitTimeInMs** - app phase time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7102">**TotalMemoryInMB** – celková pamäť</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7102">**TotalMemoryInMB** - total memory</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7103">**UIRaaSDownloadLanguagePackageBoot** – informácie týkajúce sa stiahnutia jazykového balíka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7103">**UIRaaSDownloadLanguagePackageBoot** - information related to language pack download</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7104">**UserDialogInterruptionDuringBoot** – Boolovská hodnota pre každé blokujúce dialógové okno, ktoré sa zobrazí počas štartu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7104">**UserDialogInterruptionDuringBoot** - Boolean for any blocking dialog shown during boot</span></span>


#### <a name="officeappleappleappbootmac"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7105">Office.Apple.Apple.AppBoot.Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7105">Office.Apple.Apple.AppBoot.Mac</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7106">Táto udalosť sa zhromažďuje pre aplikácie balíka Office spustené v rámci platforiem Apple.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7106">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7107">Udalosť sa používa na zhromažďovanie informácií o čase potrebnom na spustenie aplikácie, ako aj niektorých podrobností o type vykonaného spustenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7107">The event is used to collect the time taken to boot the app, as well as some details on the type of boot done.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7108">Táto udalosť nám pomáha monitorovať náš výkon a prinášať vylepšenia výkonu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7108">This event helps us monitor our performance and provide performance improvements.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7109">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7109">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7110">**Data_ Data_EvtBootTimerDocStageReady** – Čas, ktorý uplynul do dosiahnutia určitého bodu v kóde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7110">**Data_ Data_EvtBootTimerDocStageReady** - Time elapsed until reaching certain point in code.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7111">**Data_DocumentRecoveryInvoked** – Či bolo pri spustení použité obnovenie dokumentu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7111">**Data_DocumentRecoveryInvoked** - Whether document recovery was invoked during boot.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7200">**Data_ResidentMemory** – Snímka dostupnej rezidentnej pamäte počas spúšťania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7200">**Data_ResidentMemory** - A snapshot of the available resident memory during boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7201">**Data_VirtualMemory** – Snímka dostupnej virtuálnej pamäte počas spúšťania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7201">**Data_VirtualMemory** - A snapshot of the available virtual memory during boot</span></span>

#### <a name="officeappleungracefulappexithangsinprevioussession"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7202">Office.Apple.UngracefulAppExitHangsInPreviousSession</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7202">Office.Apple.UngracefulAppExitHangsInPreviousSession</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7203">Táto udalosť sa zhromažďuje pre aplikácie balíka Office spustené v rámci platforiem Apple.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7203">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7204">Udalosť sa používa na monitorovanie stavu našich aplikácií balíka Office, ako aj skúmanie príčin zlyhaní.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7204">The event is used to monitor the health of our Office applications as well as for investigating causes of failures.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7205">Zhromažďujeme informácie o tom, koľkokrát aplikácia prestala reagovať ešte pred ukončením aplikácie so zlyhaním.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7205">We collect the number of times an application appeared to be unresponsive prior to hitting an ungraceful application exit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7206">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7206">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7207">**Data_HangsDetected** – Informácia o tom, koľkokrát aplikácia prestala reagovať ešte pred zistením ukončenia aplikácie so zlyhaním.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7207">**Data_HangsDetected** - The number of times the application appeared to become unresponsive prior to observing the ungraceful application exit.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7208">**Data_LastSessionId** – Identifikátor relácie, v ktorej sa zistilo ukončenie aplikácie so zlyhaním.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7208">**Data_LastSessionId** - The identifier for the session in which the ungraceful application exit was observed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7209">**Data_SessionBuildNumber** – Vedľajšia verzia aplikácie, v ktorej bolo pozorované ukončenie aplikácie so zlyhaním.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7209">**Data_SessionBuildNumber** - The minor version of the application in which an ungraceful application exit was observed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7210">**Data_SessionVersion** – Hlavná verzia aplikácie, v ktorej bolo pozorované ukončenie aplikácie so zlyhaním.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7210">**Data_SessionVersion** - The major version of the application in which an ungraceful application exit was observed.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeapplewhatsnewerrorandwarning"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7211">Office.Apple.WhatsNewErrorAndWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7211">Office.Apple.WhatsNewErrorAndWarning</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7212">Táto udalosť sa zhromažďuje pre aplikácie balíka Office spustené v rámci platforiem Apple.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7212">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7213">Udalosť sa používa na monitorovanie stavu funkcie Čo je nové.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7213">The event is used to monitor the health of the What's New feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7214">Táto udalosť označuje, že sa vyskytla chyba alebo upozornenie počas analýzy obsahu funkcie Čo je nové a ukazuje na potenciálne problémy s tvorbou obsahu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7214">This event denotes that an error/warning occurred while parsing What's New content, pointing to potential content authoring issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7215">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7215">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7216">**Data_ContentKey** – Ukazovateľ na sekciu obsahu, ktorý pravdepodobne spôsobil chybu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7216">**Data_ContentKey** - A pointer to the section of the content that is likely to have caused the error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7217">**Data_ErrorCode** – Zistený kód chyby (ak je k dispozícii).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7217">**Data_ErrorCode** - The observed error code (if available)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7218">**Data_ErrorDescription** – Popis chyby (ak je k dispozícii).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7218">**Data_ErrorDescription** - A description of the error (if available)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7219">**Data_EventID** – Zhromažďujeme informácie o reťazci predstavujúcom typ zistenej chyby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7219">**Data_EventID** - We collect a string representing the type of error observed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7220">**Data_IncludesHTMLTag** – Či obsah obsahuje formát Rich HTML.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7220">**Data_IncludesHTMLTag** - Whether the content contains rich html</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7221">**Data_IncludesItemsTag** – Či obsah obsahuje hierarchiu položiek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7221">**Data_IncludesItemsTag** - Whether the content contains a hierarchy of items</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7222">**Data_LengthOfRawData** – Veľkosť obsahu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7222">**Data_LengthOfRawData** - The size of the content</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7223">**Data_RequestURL** – URL adresa, z ktorej bol obsah prevzatý.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7223">**Data_RequestURL** - The URL from which the content was downloaded</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7224">**Data_ServerLanguageTag** – Jazyk obsahu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7224">**Data_ServerLanguageTag** - The language the content was in.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7225">**Data_StatusCode** – Stav chyby (ak je k dispozícii).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7225">**Data_StatusCode** - The status of the error (if available)</span></span>

#### <a name="officeextensibilityrichapimethodinvocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7226">Office.Extensibility.RichApiMethodInvocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7226">Office.Extensibility.RichApiMethodInvocation</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7227">Keď zákazník použije doplnok balíka Office a zavolá rozhranie Rich API na poskytnutie služby, spustí sa táto udalosť.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7227">When customer uses an Office Add-in and calls Rich API for providing service, this event will be triggered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7228">Používa sa na meranie spoľahlivosti služby, jej výkonu a používania pri vyvolaní metódy rozhrania Rich API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7228">Used to measure the service reliability, performance, and usage for Rich API method invocation.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7229">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7229">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7230">**Api** – úplný názov rozhrania API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7230">**Api** - Full name of the API</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7231">**DispFlag** – bitový príznak s popisom typu volania metódy (napr.: 0x1 = METHOD, 0x2 = PROPERTYGET, 0x4 = PROPERTYPUT, 0x8 = PROPERTYPUTREF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7231">**DispFlag** - A bit flag describing the type of method call (Ex: 0x1 = METHOD, 0x2 = PROPERTYGET, 0x4 = PROPERTYPUT, 0x8 = PROPERTYPUTREF)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7232">**DispId** – ID odosielania volanej metódu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7232">**DispId** - Dispatch ID for the method being called</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7233">**HResult** – hodnota HResult volania metódy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7233">**HResult** - HResult for the method call</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7234">**Latency** – časové oneskorenie volania v mikrosekundách.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7234">**Latency** - Latency for the call, in microseconds</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7235">**ReqId** – identifikátor GUID dávkovej žiadosti, ktorej súčasťou je táto metóda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7235">**ReqId** - GUID for the batch request that this method belongs to</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7236">**TypeId** – identifikátor GUID rozhrania, v ktorom je táto metóda volaná.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7236">**TypeId** - GUID for the interface on which this method being called</span></span>

#### <a name="officeiospaywallfailedscreenretrybuttontap"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7237">Office.iOS.Paywall.FailedScreen.RetryButtonTap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7237">Office.iOS.Paywall.FailedScreen.RetryButtonTap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7238">Táto telemetria používania sa zhromažďuje na zistenie, keď nákup/zriadenie/aktivácia zlyhali a používateľ ťukol na tlačidlo Skúsiť znova.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7238">This usage telemetry is collected to know when the Purchase/Provisioning/Activation failed, and the user tapped the “Retry” button.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7239">Používa sa na riešenie scenárov chýb pri nákupe, ktoré vedú k zopakovaniu pokusu, a na zlepšenie spoľahlivosti procesu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7239">Used to troubleshoot purchase error scenarios that lead to retry and improve process reliability.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7240">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7240">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7241">**failureReason** reťazec – označuje, pre aké zlyhanie používateľ opakuje pokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7241">**failureReason** - String – Indicates what the failure was the user is retrying.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7242">Napríklad „provisioningFailed“, „purchaseFailed“, „activationFailed“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7242">Like “provisioningFailed”, “purchaseFailed”, “activationFailed”.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7243">**productid** – reťazec – AppStore ID produktu, pre ktorý používateľ opakuje zlyhanú požiadavku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7243">**productid** - String – App Store ID of the product for which user is retrying the failed request</span></span>


#### <a name="officemanageabilityserviceapplypolicy"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7244">Office.Manageability.Service.ApplyPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7244">Office.Manageability.Service.ApplyPolicy</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7245">Veľmi dôležitá telemetria na sledovanie zlyhania\\úspešnosti použitia nastavení cloudovej politiky na databázu Registry.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7245">Critical telemetry to track failure\\Success of applying cloud policy settings to registry.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7246">Pole LastError obsahuje informáciu o tom, prečo a kde zlyhalo použitie politiky v databáze Registry.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7246">LastError tells why and where the Application of policy in registry failed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7247">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7247">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7248">**Data.ApplyLogMsg** – hlásenie výnimky, ak sa vyskytla, počas aplikovania politiky</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7248">**Data.ApplyLogMsg** - The exception msg if any while policy was being applied</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7249">**Data.Cid** – dynamicky generovaný identifikátor korelácie odoslaný do služby, keď sa uskutočnilo volanie služby na načítanie cloudovej politiky.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7249">**Data.Cid** - dynamically generated correlation identifier sent to the service when the service call was made to fetch the cloud policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7250">Používa sa na koreláciu, ktoré volanie spôsobilo problém počas aplikovania politík v cloude.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7250">Used to correlate which call caused an issue while applying the policies on the cloud.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7251">**Data.Last Error** – jedna z piatich hodnôt reťazcov (enumerátorov) na zaznamenanie toho, ktorá fáza aplikovania politiky sa vykonávala, keď sa vyskytla výnimka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7251">**Data.Last Error** - One of five string values (enumerators) to log which stage of policy application was being executed when the exception occurred</span></span>

#### <a name="officeonenoteandroidsyncprovisioningcompleted"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7252">Office.OneNote.Android.Sync.ProvisioningCompleted</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7252">Office.OneNote.Android.Sync.ProvisioningCompleted</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7253">*[Táto udalosť sa predtým nazývala OneNote.Sync.ProvisioningCompleted.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7253">*[This event was previously named OneNote.Sync.ProvisioningCompleted.]*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7254">Kritický signál sa používa na zabezpečenie toho, aby sa po prihlásení používateľa do aplikácie OneNote pre Android správne zriadili poznámkové bloky na zaistenie bezproblémového prístupu k nim.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7254">The critical signal used to ensure that after a user signs-into a OneNote Android App, notebooks are properly provisioned so that they can be easily accessed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7255">Používa sa na zabezpečenie kritického regresného zisťovania stavu aplikácie OneNote a služby</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7255">This is used to ensure critical regression detection for OneNote app and service health</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7256">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7256">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7257">**AppSuspendedDuringEvent** – vráti Boolovskú hodnotu, ktorá označuje, či bola aplikácia počas poskytovania pozastavená</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7257">**AppSuspendedDuringEvent** - Returns Boolean to indicate if app was suspended during provisioning</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7258">**NetworkConnection** – typ sieťového pripojenia používaného zariadenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7258">**NetworkConnection** - The type of network connectivity of the device in use</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7259">**NetworkDataExchange** – zaznamená počet bajtov vymenených počas poskytovania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7259">**NetworkDataExchange** - Records the number of bytes exchanged during provisioning.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7260">**ServerType** – vráti typ servera, ktorý ponúka službu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7260">**ServerType** - Returns the type of the server offering the service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7261">**TimeTakenInMilliSeconds** – vráti čas potrebný na dokončenie poskytovania v milisekundách</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7261">**TimeTakenInMilliSeconds** - Returns time taken to complete provisioning in millisecond</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7267">**ErrorCode** – vráti kód chyby zodpovedný za zlyhanie poskytovania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7267">**ErrorCode** – Returns the error code responsible for failure of provisioning</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7268">**NetworkConnection**: typ sieťového pripojenia používaného zariadenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7268">**NetworkConnection**: The type of network connectivity of the device in use</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7269">**NetworkDataExchange** – zaznamená počet bajtov vymenených počas poskytovania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7269">**NetworkDataExchange** - Records the number of bytes exchanged during provisioning.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7270">**ServerType**: vráti typ servera, ktorý ponúka službu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7270">**ServerType**: Returns the type of the server offering the service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7271">**TimeTakenInMilliSeconds**: vráti čas potrebný na dokončenie poskytovania v milisekundách</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7271">**TimeTakenInMilliSeconds**: Returns time taken to complete provisioning in millisecond</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7277">**NetworkConnection** – typ sieťového pripojenia používaného zariadenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7277">**NetworkConnection** - The type of network connectivity of the device in use</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7278">**ServerType** – vráti typ servera, ktorý ponúka službu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7278">**ServerType** - Returns the type of the server offering the service</span></span>

#### <a name="officeonenotesystembootdialogssafebootdialogpending"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7279">Office.OneNote.System.BootDialogs.SafeBootDialogPending</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7279">Office.OneNote.System.BootDialogs.SafeBootDialogPending</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7280">Kritický signál, ktorý sa používa na sledovanie, keď sa rozhodneme používateľovi zobraziť dialógové okno bezpečného spustenia pri ďalšom spustení systému, pretože spúšťanie neustále zlyhávalo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7280">The critical signal used to track when we decide to show user a safe boot dialog on next boot because we have been crashing on boot multiple times continuously.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7281">Používa sa na zabezpečenie kritického regresného zisťovania stavu aplikácie OneNote a služby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7281">This is used to ensure critical regression detection for OneNote app and service health.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7282">Ak sa používateľom zobrazuje dialógové okno bezpečného spustenia, vyskytla sa kritická chyba spustenia a tieto informácie nám pomôžu zistiť, koľko používateľov má takúto chybu a koľko používateľov spustí aplikáciu znova a zobrazí si dialógové okno bezpečného spustenia a počet tých, ktorí sa nevrátili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7282">If users are seeing the safe boot dialog, then we have a critical boot crash bug and this info will help us know how many users are facing this issue and how many users boot the app again to actually see the safe boot dialog vs how many don’t return.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7283">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7283">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

 - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7284">Žiadne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7284">None</span></span>

#### <a name="officeoutlookdesktopbootperfmetrics"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7285">Office.Outlook.Desktop.BootPerfMetrics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7285">Office.Outlook.Desktop.BootPerfMetrics</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7286">Táto udalosť zhromažďuje čas potrebný na spustenie Outlooku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7286">Collects time taken to boot Outlook.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7287">Čas spúšťania Outlooku sa aktívne monitoruje na zisťovanie a diagnostiku regresií.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7287">The boot time of Outlook is actively monitored to detect and diagnose regressions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7288">Používa sa aj na diagnostikovanie eskalácií zákazníkov, ako aj na postupné zlepšovanie výkonu spúšťania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7288">It is also used to diagnose customer escalations and improve boot performance over time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7289">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7289">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7290">**AddinElapsedTotal** – celkový čas strávený načítavaním doplnkov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7290">**AddinElapsedTotal** - Total time spent for loading add-ins</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7291">**CredPromptCount** – počet zobrazených výziev na zadanie poverení</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7291">**CredPromptCount** – Number of credential prompts shown</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7292">**ElapsedTotal** – celkový čas strávený spúšťaním</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7292">**ElapsedTotal** - Total time spent for boot</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7293">**IsLoggingEnabled** – či je zapisovanie do denníka povolené</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7293">**IsLoggingEnabled** - Is logging enabled</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7294">**ShowChooseProfileDlg** – či sa zobrazilo dialógové okno výberu profilu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7294">**ShowChooseProfileDlg** – Whether the Choose Profile Dialog was shown</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7295">**ShowFirstRunDlg** – či ide o prvé spustenie Outlooku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7295">**ShowFirstRunDlg** - is outlook launched for the first time</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7296">**ShowIMAPSrchfldWarningDlg** – výstrahy v prípade konta IMAP s ANSI PST</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7296">**ShowIMAPSrchfldWarningDlg** - Warnings in case we have an IMAP account with an ANSI PST</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7297">**ShowNeedSupportDlg** – dialógové okno podpory spustené zlyhaním pri spustení</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7297">**ShowNeedSupportDlg** - Boot failure triggered support dialog</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7298">**ShowSafeModeDlg** – či sa relácia otvorila v núdzovom režime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7298">**ShowSafeModeDlg** - is the session opened in safe mode</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7299">**ShowScanPstDlg** – zobrazuje, či sa pri kontrole opravy ukladacieho priestoru zobrazilo chybové hlásenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7299">**ShowScanPstDlg** - Store repair check displayed error message</span></span>


#### <a name="officeoutlookmacbootperf"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7300">Office.Outlook.Mac.BootPerf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7300">Office.Outlook.Mac.BootPerf</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7301">Táto udalosť zhromažďuje čas potrebný na spustenie Outlooku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7301">Collects time taken to boot Outlook.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7302">Čas spúšťania Outlooku sa aktívne monitoruje na zisťovanie a diagnostiku regresií.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7302">The boot time of Outlook is actively monitored to detect and diagnose regressions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7303">Používa sa aj na diagnostikovanie eskalácií zákazníkov, ako aj na postupné zlepšovanie výkonu spúšťania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7303">It is also used to diagnose customer escalations and improve boot performance over time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7304">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7304">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7305">**MacOLKBootPerfDuration** – celkový čas strávený spúšťaním.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7305">**MacOLKBootPerfDuration** - total time spent booting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7306">**MacOLKBootPerfID** – identifikátor času stráveného spúšťaním.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7306">**MacOLKBootPerfID** - identifier for the time spent booting</span></span>


#### <a name="officeoutlookmacperformanceunresponsive"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7307">Office.Outlook.Mac.PerformanceUnresponsive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7307">Office.Outlook.Mac.PerformanceUnresponsive</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7308">Používa sa na identifikovanie problémov s vplyvom na používateľov v Outlooku, ktoré sa môžu prejaviť v zníženom výkone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7308">Used to identify user impacting issues in Outlook that may manifest as degraded performance.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7309">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7309">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7310">**Duration** – čas, ktorý uplynul pri zníženom výkone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7310">**Duration** - time elapsed of degraded performance</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7311">**EventType** – typ udalosti so zníženým výkonom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7311">**EventType** - type of event experiencing degraded performance</span></span>


#### <a name="officeperformanceboot"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7312">Office.Performance.Boot</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7312">Office.Performance.Boot</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7313">Táto udalosť sa zhromažďuje pri spustení aplikácie balíka Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7313">Collected when an Office application is booted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7314">Obsahuje informácie o tom, či spustenie bolo iniciované otvorením súboru alebo spustením prostredníctvom ponuky Štart, či išlo o prvé spustenie aplikácie, aké množstvo pamäte aplikácia používa a či sa používateľovi zobrazilo nejaké blokujúce používateľské rozhranie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7314">Includes whether the boot was initiated by opening a file or launching via the Start menu, whether this was the first boot of the application, how much memory the application is using, and whether there was any blocking UI shown to the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7315">Používa sa na meranie rýchlosti spustenia aplikácií balíka Office a množstva pamäte, ktoré používajú pri štarte, aby sa zaistilo, že je to prijateľné pre používateľa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7315">Used to measure how fast Office applications boot and how much memory they use when they start, to ensure there is an acceptable user experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7316">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7316">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7317">**ActivationKind** – zobrazuje, či sa aplikácia spustila spustením z ponuky Štart, otvorením súboru alebo prostredníctvom automatizácie OLE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7317">**ActivationKind** - Whether the application was started by launching from the Start menu, by opening a file, or through OLE Automation.</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7318">**BootToStart** – či používateľ zvolil zobrazenie domovskej obrazovky po spustení aplikácie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7318">**BootToStart** - Whether the user has chosen to show the start screen when this application starts.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7319">**ColdBoot** – označuje, či ide o prvé spustenie aplikácie balíka Office po reštartovaní systému alebo či bolo potrebné načítať binárny súbor aplikácie z disku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7319">**ColdBoot** - Whether this is the first time the Office application ran after a system restart or application binary had to be loaded from disk.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7320">(len macOS/iOS)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7320">(macOS/iOS only)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7321">**DeviceModel** – model zariadenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7321">**DeviceModel** - The model of the device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7322">(len macOS/iOS)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7322">(macOS/iOS only)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7323">**DocLocation** – pri otváraní dokumentu označuje, ktorá služba poskytla dokument (OneDrive, súborový server, SharePoint atď.).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7323">**DocLocation** -  When opening a document, indicates which service provided the document (OneDrive, File Server, SharePoint, etc.).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7324">**DurationUntilMso20Initialization** – trvanie v mikrosekundách od inicializácie procesu balíka Office po načítanie súboru mso20win32client.dll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7324">**DurationUntilMso20Initialization** - The duration in microseconds it took between when the Office process was initialized and mso20win32client.dll was loaded.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7325">**Embedding** – označuje, či aplikácia bola otvorená na vkladanie OLE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7325">**Embedding** – Whether the app was opened for OLE embedding.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7326">**FirstBoot** – zobrazuje, či išlo o prvé spustenie aplikácie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7326">**FirstBoot** - Whether this was a first boot of the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7327">**FreeMemoryPercentage** – aké percento pamäte v zariadení je voľné.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7327">**FreeMemoryPercentage** – What percent of memory on the device is free.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7328">(iba Windows)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7328">(Windows only)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7329">**InitializationDuration** – trvanie prvej inicializácie procesu balíka Office v mikrosekundách.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7329">**InitializationDuration** - The duration in microseconds it took to first initialize the Office process.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7330">**InterruptionMessageId** – ID dialógového okna, ak bolo spustenie prerušené dialógovým oknom s výzvou pre používateľa na zadanie údajov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7330">**InterruptionMessageId** - If the boot was interrupted by a dialog asking for user input, the ID of the dialog.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7331">**LegacyDuration** – časový úsek trvania spustenia aplikácie meraný pomocou iných počiatočných a koncových bodov než udalosť Activity.Duration.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7331">**LegacyDuration** - The length of time the activity took to execute, measured using different starting and ending points than Activity.Duration.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7332">**OpenAsNew** – označuje, či sa aplikácia spustila otvorením existujúceho dokumentu ako šablóny pre nový.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7332">**OpenAsNew** – Whether the app was started by opening an existing document as the template for a new one.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7333">**PageFaultCount** – počet zlyhaní strán pre proces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7333">**PageFaultCount** – The number of page faults for the process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7334">(iba Windows)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7334">(Windows only)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7335">**PrimaryDiskType** – určuje, či primárnym ukladacím zariadením je jednotka SSD alebo otáčajúci sa disk a podľa vhodnosti rýchlosť otáčania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7335">**PrimaryDiskType** – Whether the primary storage device is a solid-state drive or a rotational drive and its rotation speed if applicable.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7336">(len macOS/iOS)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7336">(macOS/iOS only)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7337">**PrivateCommitUsageMB** – vyhradenie potvrdenia (t. j. množstvo pamäte, ktoré správca pamäte potvrdil pre tento proces) v megabajtoch pre tento proces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7337">**PrivateCommitUsageMB** – The Commit Charge (i.e., the amount of memory that the memory manager has committed for this process) in megabytes for this process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7338">(iba Windows)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7338">(Windows only)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7339">**ProcessorCount** – počet procesorov v zariadení.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7339">**ProcessorCount** – The number of processors on the device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7340">(len macOS/iOS)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7340">(macOS/iOS only)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7341">**TotalPhysicalMemory** – celkové množstvo fyzickej pamäte v zariadení.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7341">**TotalPhysicalMemory** – The total amount of physical memory on the device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7342">(len macOS/iOS)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7342">(macOS/iOS only)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7343">**TotalWorkingSetMB** – množstvo pamäte v megabajtoch v pracovnej sade procesu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7343">**TotalWorkingSetMB** - The amount of memory in megabytes in the process's working set.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7344">**VirtualSetMB** – množstvo pamäte v megabajtoch vo virtuálnej sade procesu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7344">**VirtualSetMB** - The amount of memory in megabytes in the process's virtual set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7345">(len macOS/iOS)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7345">(macOS/iOS only)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7346">**WorkingSetPeakMB** – najväčšie množstvo pamäte v megabajtoch, ktoré bolo doteraz v pracovnej súprave procesu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7346">**WorkingSetPeakMB** - The largest amount of memory in megabytes that was ever in the process's working set so far.</span></span>


#### <a name="officepowerpointpptandroidrehearseview"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7347">Office.PowerPoint.PPT.Android.RehearseView</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7347">Office.PowerPoint.PPT.Android.RehearseView</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7348">Táto udalosť označuje, že používateľ ukončil reláciu skúšky.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7348">This event is denoting that user has stopped the rehearsal session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7349">V kombinácii s Office.PowerPoint.PPT.Android.RehearseView.StartSession pôjde o prvý indikátor akéhokoľvek zlyhania alebo chyby, ktorým používateľ čelí.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7349">In combination with Office.PowerPoint.PPT.Android.RehearseView.StartSession this will be the first indicator of any crashes or errors that user faces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7350">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7350">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7351">**ConnectionCreationTime** – čas na vytvorenie bočných pripojení k služby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7351">**ConnectionCreationTime** - time taken to create service side connections.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7352">**CountDownAlertTime** – čas, pre ktorý sa zobrazilo upozornenie na odpočítavanie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7352">**CountDownAlertTime** – Time for which countdown alert was displayed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7353">**CountdownInitTime –** – čas medzi dokončením načítania prezentácie a spustením odpočítavania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7353">**CountdownInitTime–** Time between slideshow load completed and countdown started.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7354">**CritiqueSummary** – Súhrn toho, čo všetci kritici videli, spolu s ich počtami.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7354">**CritiqueSummary** - Summary of what all critiques user saw with their counts.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7355">**ExitEventCode** – kód na identifikáciu toho, v ktorom scenári používateľ ukončil skúšobnú reláciu, či išlo o chybový scenár, alebo úspešné ukončenie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7355">**ExitEventCode** – Code to identify under which scenario user exit out of rehearse session, whether it was error scenario or successful exit.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7356">**FRETime** – čas od začatia zobrazovania obrazovky FRE, kým ju používateľ nezrušil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7356">**FRETime** - Time between FRE screen started to display until user dismissed it.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7357">**MicrophonePermissionTime** – čas, pre ktorý sa zobrazilo upozornenie na povolenie mikrofónu, kým používateľ nevybral niektorú z možností.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7357">**MicrophonePermissionTime** - Time for which microphone permission alert was displayed until user select one of the options.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7358">**ResumeRehearsingCount** – počet kliknutí používateľa na pozastavenie skúšky.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7358">**PauseRehearsingCount** – Count of how many times user clicked on pause rehearsal.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7359">**RehearsalInitTime** – čas potrebný na inicializáciu skúšky.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7359">**RehearsalInitTime** - Time taken by rehearsal to initialize.</span></span>

#### <a name="officepowerpointrehearsalsessionmetrics"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7396">Office.PowerPoint.Rehearsal.SessionMetrics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7396">Office.PowerPoint.Rehearsal.SessionMetrics</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7397">Udalosť spustená, keď sa relácia reči zastaví pre nástroj Presenter Coach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7397">Event triggered when the speech session is stopped for Presenter Coach.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7398">Táto udalosť nám pomáha pri zachytávaní určitých metrík pre reláciu nácviku v nástroji Presenter Coach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7398">This event helps us in capturing some metrics for a rehearsal session in Presenter Coach.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7399">Pomôže pri udržaní vysokej kvality služby v budúcnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7399">It will help in maintaining a high quality of service for this feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7400">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7400">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7401">**ActualRehearseBootTimeInMs** – skutočný čas, ktorý bol potrebný na vytvorenie pripojení.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7401">**ActualRehearseBootTimeInMs** – This is the actual time taken for the connections to be created.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7402">**AdaptationTextSize** – veľkosť textu, ktorý sa odosiela do služby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7402">**AdaptationTextSize** – This is the size of the text that is sent to service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7403">**AuthDurationInMs** – Čas v milisekundách potrebný na overenie (obnovenie overovacieho tokenu).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7403">**AuthDurationInMs** – This is the time taken in milliseconds for authentication (refresh the auth token).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7404">**AuthError** – Popis chyby overenia, ktorá sa vyskytla (ak vôbec).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7404">**AuthError** – This describes the authentication error that occurred (if at all).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7405">**AvgFragmentLatencyInMs** – Priemerný čas sieťových hlasových správ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7405">**AvgFragmentLatencyInMs** – This is the average round-trip time for network speech messages.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7406">**ConnectDurationInMs** – Čas v milisekundách potrebný na dokončenie pripojenia relácie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7406">**ConnectDurationInMs** – This is the time taken in milliseconds for the session to complete the connection.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7407">**FirstAudioDelayInMs** – Čas v milisekundách potrebný na prijatie prvých zvukových údajov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7407">**FirstAudioDelayInMs** – This is the time taken in milliseconds for the first audio data to be received.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7408">**FRetriedOnOpenConnection** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či pre otvorenie pripojenia došlo k opakovaniu pokusu alebo nie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7408">**FRetriedOnOpenConnection** – This is a Boolean that indicates whether retry happens for openconnection or not.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7409">**InitMediaCaptureLayerDurationInMs** – Čas v milisekundách potrebný na inicializáciu vrstvy zachytávania médií/zvuku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7409">**InitMediaCaptureLayerDurationInMs** – This is the time taken in milliseconds to initialize the media/audio capture layer.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7410">**LocallyDroppedMessageCount** – Celkový počet lokálne zrušených správ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7410">**LocallyDroppedMessageCount** – This is the total number of messages dropped locally.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7411">**NumReconnectAttemptsDuringSession** – označuje počet pokusov o opätovné pripojenie k službe reči.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7411">**NumReconnectAttemptsDuringSession** – This indicates how many times the attempt was made to reconnect to speechservice.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7412">**NumTriesDuringEachReconnectAttempt** – toto pole označuje počet pokusov vykonaných počas každého pokusu o opätovné pripojenie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7412">**NumTriesDuringEachReconnectAttempt** – This is an array that indicates number of tries that were done during each reconnect attempt.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7413">**OpenFrontDoorConnectionDurationInMs** – Čas v milisekundách potrebný na otvorenie pripojenia k službe FrontDoor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7413">**OpenFrontDoorConnectionDurationInMs** – This is the time in milliseconds taken to open the connection to the FrontDoor service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7414">**SendAdaptationTextDurationInMs** – Čas v milisekundách potrebný na odoslanie textu prispôsobenia do služby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7414">**SendAdaptationTextDurationInMs** – This is the time taken in milliseconds to send the adaptation text to the service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7415">**ServiceDroppedMessageCount** – Celkový počet správ zrušených službou.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7415">**ServiceDroppedMessageCount** – This is the total number of messages dropped by the service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7416">**SessionDurationInMs** – čas trvania celej relácie, odkedy používateľ klikol na spustenie, kým klikol na zastavenie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7416">**SessionDurationInMs** – This is the time duration of entire session from when user clicked start to when user clicked stop.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7417">**SessionId** – Identifikátor relácie reči.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7417">**SessionId** – This is the speech frontdoor session ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7418">Môžeme ho použiť na ladenie denníkov služby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7418">We can use this to debug service logs.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7419">**SpeechClientResultEventsWithTimestamps** – Pole prijatých chybových kódov spoločne s časovými pečiatkmi, ktoré môže pomôcť pri ladení.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7419">**SpeechClientResultEventsWithTimestamps** – This is an array of error codes received along with the timestamps, which can help in debugging.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7420">**SpeechHResultsWithTimestamps** – Pole prijatých chybových kódov spoločne s časovými pečiatkmi, ktoré môže pomôcť pri ladení.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7420">**SpeechHResultsWithTimestamps** – This is an array of error codes received along with the timestamps, which can help in debugging.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7421">**StartSpeechCaptureDurationInMs** – Čas v milisekundách potrebný na spustenie zachytávania reťi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7421">**StartSpeechCaptureDurationInMs** – This is the time taken in milliseconds to start speech capture.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7422">**StartSpeechServiceDurationInMs** – pole s časom, ktorý bol potrebný na spustenie relácie reči pri každom výskyte opätovného pripojenia vrátane trvania prvého spustenia relácie reči.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7422">**StartSpeechServiceDurationInMs** – This is an array of time taken to start speech session every time there is a reconnect, including first start speech session duration also.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7423">**TotalMessageCount** – Celkový počet zvukových správ odoslaných do služby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7423">**TotalMessageCount** – This is the total number of audio messages sent to the service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7424">**WebSocketConnectDurationInMs** – Čas v milisekundách potrebný na dokončenie pripojenia webového socketu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7424">**WebSocketConnectDurationInMs** – This is the time taken in milliseconds to complete the web socket connection.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7446">**Data_InsiderLevelNew** – úroveň programu Insider pri zatvorení dialógového okna „Zapojte sa do programu Office Insider“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7446">**Data_InsiderLevelNew** - Insider level on closing of "Join Office Insider" dialog</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7447">**Data_IsInternalUser** – označuje, či je aplikácia spustená s prihlasovacími údajmi podnikového konta Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7447">**Data_IsInternalUser** - Indicates whether the application runs under the credentials of a Microsoft corporate account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7448">**Data_IsInternalUserInit** – označuje, či kód dokázal určiť, či je aplikácia spustená s prihlasovacími údajmi podnikového konta Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7448">**Data_IsInternalUserInit** - Indicates whether the code could determine whether the application runs under the credentials of a Microsoft corporate account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7449">**Data_OpenNewsletterWebpage** – označuje, či sa spustilo prepojenie prihlásenia na odber bulletinu Office Insider s podmienkou, že sa používateľ zapojil do programu Office Insider, funkcia odberu bulletinu je zapnutá a používateľ nezrušil otvorenie webovej stránky prihlásenia na odber bulletinu Office Insider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7449">**Data_OpenNewsletterWebpage** - Indicates whether Office Insider Newsletter Subscription link was triggered under condition that user has joined Office Insider program, Newsletter Subscription feature is enabled, and the user have not canceled opening of Office Insider Newsletter Subscription webpage.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7451">**Data_RegisterInsiderHr** – výsledný kód registrácie v programe Office Insider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7451">**Data_RegisterInsiderHr** - Result code for Office Insider registration</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7452">**Data_RegistrationStateCurrent** – aktuálny stav registrácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7452">**Data_RegistrationStateCurrent** - Current registration state</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7464">Táto udalosť zhromažďuje údaje o výkone otvárania súborov pre Visio Dev16.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7464">This event collects File open perf data for Visio Dev16.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7465">Používa sa na monitorovanie výkonu funkcie otvárania súborov a spája ho s vlastnosťami súboru, ako je napríklad veľkosť súboru, pre Visio Dev16.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7465">This event is used to monitor performance of File open and associates it with file properties like file size for Visio Dev16.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7466">Vlastnosti súboru nám umožňujú rýchlejšie ladiť problémy a zistiť ich prvotnú príčinu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7466">File properties enable us to debug and root cause issues faster.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7467">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7467">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
