#### <a name="officeandroidandroidfilesavestatus"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7688">Office.Android.AndroidFileSaveStatus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7688">Office.Android.AndroidFileSaveStatus</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7689">Dôležité na zachytávanie údajov o stave uložení súborov a rôznych kódov chýb z rôznych súčastí.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7689">Critical to capture File save status data and various error codes from different components.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7690">Spoločnosť Microsoft používa tieto údaje na analýzu toho, či došlo k strate údajov používateľa v aplikácii počas ukladania súborov v aplikáciách Word, Excel alebo PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7690">Microsoft uses this data to analyze if there is any user data loss in the app during saving of files in Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7691">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7691">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7692">**AccessMode** – Hodnoty\*\* – None, ReadOnly, ReadOnlyUpgradable, ReadWrite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7692">**AccessMode** - Values\*\* - None, ReadOnly, ReadOnlyUpgradable, ReadWrite.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7693">**AppDocsEndReason** – enumerácia pre dôvod ukončenia uloženia súboru AppDocs EndReason.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7693">**AppDocsEndReason** - enumeration for File save Appdoc EndReason.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7694">Hodnoty: None, Success, Failure, Cancel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7694">Values: None, Success, Failure, Cancel.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7695">**AppDocsErrorCode** – posledný kódu chyby pri zlyhaní ukladania súboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7695">**AppDocsErrorCode** - Final Error Code for file save failure</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7696">**AppDocsTriggeringSaveDetails** – pole, ktoré označuje, či AppDocs spúšťa uloženie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7696">**AppDocsTriggeringSaveDetails** - field to indicate if AppDocs is triggering the save</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7697">**DocInstanceId** – DocInstanceId ID inštancie dokumentu vygenerované AppDocs, ktoré je zamerané na inštanciu operácie v dokumente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7697">**DocInstanceId** - DocInstanceId the document instance ID generated by AppDocs that is scoped to an operation instance on a document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7698">**ExcelFileSaveResult** – špecifický kód HResult v Exceli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7698">**ExcelFileSaveResult** - Excel-specific HResult</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7699">**FileExtension** – prípona súboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7699">**FileExtension** - Extension of file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7700">**FileIOSaveErrorCode** – kód chyby vo FileIO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7700">**FileIOSaveErrorCode** - Error code in FileIO</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7701">**FileIOSaveHResult** – kód HResult vo FileIO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7701">**FileIOSaveHResult** - Hresult in FileIO</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7702">**FileIOSaveIsCopy** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či ide o operáciu kópie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7702">**FileIOSaveIsCopy** - Boolean to indicate if this is a copy operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7703">**FileSize** – veľkosť súboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7703">**FileSize** - Size of file</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7704">**FileSourceLocation** – enumerácia umiestnenia súboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7704">**FileSourceLocation** - File location enumeration.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7705">Hodnoty: None, Local, UncOrMappedNetworkDrive, SkyDrive, App, SharePoint, UnknownServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7705">Values: None, Local, UncOrMappedNetworkDrive, SkyDrive, App, SharePoint, UnknownServer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7706">**OpFlags** – príznaky operácie uloženia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7706">**OpFlags** - Operation flags for save</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7707">**PPTFileSaveFailHresult** – kód HResult v PPT pri zlyhaní uloženia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7707">**PPTFileSaveFailHresult** - PPT hresult for save failure</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7708">**PPTFileSaveFailTag** – značka v PPT pri zlyhaní uloženia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7708">**PPTFileSaveFailTag** - PPT tag for save failure</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7709">**State** – enumerácia stavu otvorenia súboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7709">**State** - File Open state enumeration.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7710">**Hodnoty** – None, Creating, Created, CreateFailed, Opening, Opened, OpenFailed, Copying, Copied, CopyFailed, Closing, Closed, CloseFail</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7710">**Values** - None, Creating, Created, CreateFailed, Opening, Opened, OpenFailed, Copying, Copied, CopyFailed, Closing, Closed, CloseFail</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7711">**WordFileCopyErrorTrackbackTag** – značka odkazu pri zlyhaní vo fáze CopyDocument vo Worde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7711">**WordFileCopyErrorTrackbackTag** - trackback tag for failure is CopyDocument stage in Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7712">**WordFileSaveCancelReason** – značka odkazu pri zrušeniach vo Worde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7712">**WordFileSaveCancelReason** - trackback tag for cancels in word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7713">**WordFileSaveEid** – špecifický kód chyby pre Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7713">**WordFileSaveEid** - Word-specific error code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7714">**WordFileSaveErrorTrackbackTag** – značka odkazu pri zlyhaniach uloženia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7714">**WordFileSaveErrorTrackbackTag** - trackback tag for save failures</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7715">**WordFileSaveOpResult** – enumerácia pre stav výsledku 0 v prípade úspechu, 1 v prípade zlyhania, 2 v prípade zrušenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7715">**WordFileSaveOpResult** - enumeration for result status 0 if succeeded, 1 if failed, 2 if canceled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7716">**WordFileSaveSuccess** – enumerácia pre špecifické podrobnosti vo Worde pri úspešnej operácii uloženia súborov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7716">**WordFileSaveSuccess** - enumeration for Word-specific details for file save operation success.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidandroidofficeactivationlatency"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7717">Office.Android.AndroidOfficeActivationLatency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7717">Office.Android.AndroidOfficeActivationLatency</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7718">Dôležité údaje na zhromažďovanie komplexného času otvorenia súborov pre všetky otvorenia súborov v aplikáciách Windows, Excel a PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7718">Critical data to collect end-to-end file open time for all file opens in Windows, Excel, PowerPoint apps.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7719">Spoločnosť Microsoft používa túto možnosť na zistenie metriky pre výkon našich aplikácií pri otváraní súborov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7719">This is used by Microsoft to find out the metric for file open performance of our apps</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7720">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7720">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7721">**AppBootingOccured** – Boolovská hodnota na kontrolu, či je štart aplikácie dokončený</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7721">**AppBootingOccured** - Boolean to check if app boot is complete</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7722">**ApplicationBootTime** – čas potrebný počas konkrétnej fázy štartu aplikácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7722">**ApplicationBootTime** - time required during a specific phase of app boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7723">**AppSuspendedDuringBoot** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorou sa kontroluje, či bola aplikácia pozastavená počas štartu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7723">**AppSuspendedDuringBoot** - Boolean to check if app was suspended during boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7724">**BlockingUIShownDuringFileOpen** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či sa počas operácie otvorenia súboru zobrazilo nejaké blokovacie dialógové okno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7724">**BlockingUIShownDuringFileOpen** - Boolean to indicate if there was any blocking dialog during the file open operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7725">**CachedInfoAvailable** – Boolovská hodnota, ak hľadáte informácie vo vyrovnávacej pamäti špecifické pre operáciu otvorenia súboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7725">**CachedInfoAvailable** - Boolean to look for cached info specific to file open operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7726">**DocumentRecoveryInvoked** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či nejaký dokument čakal na obnovenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7726">**DocumentRecoveryInvoked** - Boolean to indicate if there was a document pending for recovery</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7727">**EndToEndActivationTime** – čas potrebný na vykreslenie súboru pre súbory otvorené mimo aplikácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7727">**EndToEndActivationTime** - time taken to render the file for files opened from outside the app</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7728">**EndToEndFileOpenTime** – čas potrebný na vykreslenie súboru pre súbory otvorené v rámci aplikácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7728">**EndToEndFileOpenTime** - time taken to render the file for files opened from inside the app</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7729">**FileOpenPhaseDurationInMs** – čas operácie otvorenia súboru spotrebovaný v konkrétnej fáze</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7729">**FileOpenPhaseDurationInMs** - file open operation time consumed by specific phase</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7730">**FileSourceLocation** – hodnota enumerácie pre umiestnenie súboru, napríklad None, Local, UncOrMappedNetworkDrive, SkyDrive, App, SharePoint, UnknownServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7730">**FileSourceLocation** - enumeration value for File location such as None, Local, UncOrMappedNetworkDrive, SkyDrive, App, SharePoint, UnknownServer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7731">**InitalizationReason** – vstupný bod pre otvorenie súboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7731">**InitalizationReason** - entry point for file open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7732">**InitialBootPhaseTime** – čas potrebný počas konkrétnej fázy štartu aplikácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7732">**InitialBootPhaseTime** - time required during a specific phase of app boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7733">**IsThisFirstLaunch** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či je toto prvé spustenie aplikácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7733">**IsThisFirstLaunch** - Boolean to indicate if this is the first launch of the app</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7734">**MinimumLibraryLoadPhaseTime** – čas potrebný počas konkrétnej fázy štartu aplikácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7734">**MinimumLibraryLoadPhaseTime** - time required during a specific phase of app boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7735">**MinimumLibraryLoadPhaseTime** – čas potrebný počas konkrétnej fázy štartu aplikácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7735">**MinimumLibraryLoadPhaseTime** - time required during a specific phase of app boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7736">**MinimumLibraryLoadPhaseTime** – čas potrebný počas konkrétnej fázy štartu aplikácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7736">**MinimumLibraryLoadPhaseTime** - time required during a specific phase of app boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7737">**PostAppInitTimeInMs** – čas potrebný počas konkrétnej fázy štartu aplikácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7737">**PostAppInitTimeInMs** - time required during a specific phase of app boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7738">**PPTRenderPhase** – čas, ktorý sa vzťahuje na konkrétnu fázu vo vykresľovaní v PPT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7738">**PPTRenderPhase** - time related to specific phase in PPT rendering</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7739">**PreAppInitTimeInMs** – čas potrebný počas konkrétnej fázy štartu aplikácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7739">**PreAppInitTimeInMs** - time required during a specific phase of app boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7740">**ProviderApp** – názov balíka aplikácie, z ktorej sa súbor otvoril</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7740">**ProviderApp** - the package name of the app from which file is opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7741">**TelemetryReason** – hodnota enumerácie, ktorá je podobná ako InitialisationReason, ale podrobnejšia ohľadom vstupného bodu otvorenia súboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7741">**TelemetryReason** - similar to InitialisationReason, but more detailed enumeration value regarding the entry point for File open.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7742">**UserDialogInterruptionDuringBoot** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či sa počas štartu zobrazilo nejaké blokujúce dialógové okno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7742">**UserDialogInterruptionDuringBoot** - Boolean to indicate if there was any blocking dialog during the boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7743">**XLRenderPhase** – čas, ktorý sa vzťahuje na konkrétnu fázu vo vykresľovaní v Exceli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7743">**XLRenderPhase** - time related to specific phase in Excel rendering</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidappdocsfileoperationends"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7744">Office.Android.AppDocsFileOperationEnds</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7744">Office.Android.AppDocsFileOperationEnds</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7745">Údaje telemetrie Critical Docs Android Only (AppDocs) pre koncové operácie Súbor Nový/Otvoriť/Uložiť ako.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7745">Critical Docs Android Only (AppDocs) telemetry data for File New/Open/SaveAs end operations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7746">Týmto sa zachytávajú kódy chýb pre zlyhania týchto operácií AppDocsOperations.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7746">This captures error codes for failures of these AppDocsOperations.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7747">Spoločnosť Microsoft používa túto možnosť na identifikovanie zlyhaní v rôznych operáciách súborov a presnej vrstvy, v ktorej došlo k zlyhaniu aplikácií Word, Excel alebo PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7747">Microsoft uses this to identify failures in various file operations and the exact layer at which the failure has occurred in Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7748">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7748">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7749">**AccessMode** – hodnota enumerácie režimu prístupu pre súbor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7749">**AccessMode** - enumeration value for the access mode for the file.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7750">Hodnoty: None, ReadOnly, ReadOnlyUpgradable, ReadWrite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7750">Values: None, ReadOnly, ReadOnlyUpgradable, ReadWrite</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7751">**BlockingUIShown** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či sa zobrazilo blokovacie používateľské rozhranie kdekoľvek v postupe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7751">**BlockingUIShown** - Boolean to indicate if blocking UI was shown in the flow anywhere.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7752">**ContentUriAuthority** – autorita URL adresy obsahu z SAF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7752">**ContentUriAuthority** - the authority of the content URL from SAF</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7753">**Correlation** – identifikátor GUID pre ID korelácie v súvislosti s operáciou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7753">**Correlation** - GUID for the correlation ID related to the operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7754">**DocId** – ID dokumentu vygenerované AppDocs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7754">**DocId** - the document ID generated by AppDocs</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7755">**DocInstanceId** – DocInstanceId ID inštancie dokumentu vygenerované AppDocs, ktoré je zamerané na inštanciu operácie v dokumente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7755">**DocInstanceId** - DocInstanceId the document instance ID generated by AppDocs that is scoped to an operation instance on a document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7756">**DocIsEnterpriseProtected** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či je dokument chránený.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7756">**DocIsEnterpriseProtected** - Boolean to indicate if document is protected.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7757">**DocUserId** – ID používateľa z vrstvy overenia MS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7757">**DocUserId** - user ID from the MS auth layer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7758">**DocUserIdProvider** – enumerácia predstavujúca poskytovateľa ID používateľa, 0 = neznáme, 1 = LiveId; 2 = OrgId, 3 = SSPI, 4 = ADAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7758">**DocUserIdProvider** - enumeration that represents the user ID provider, 0 = Unkown, 1 = LiveId, 2 = OrgId, 3 = SSPI, 4 = ADAL</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7759">**DurationInMs** – čas v milisekundách na ukončenie operácie súboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7759">**DurationInMs** - time in milliseconds for the file operation to end</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7760">**EndReason** – hodnota enumerácie pre dôvod ukončenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7760">**EndReason** - enumeration value for the end reason.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7761">Hodnoty: None, Success, Failure, Cancel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7761">Values: None, Success, Failure, Cancel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7762">**ErrorCode** – kód chyby pre operáciu súboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7762">**ErrorCode** - error code for the file operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7763">**Extension** – prvé štyri znaky prípony otvoreného súboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7763">**Extension** - first four characters of the extension of the file being opened.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7764">**FileSourceLocation** – hodnota enumerácie pre umiestnenie súboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7764">**FileSourceLocation** - enumeration value for file location.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7765">Možné hodnoty: None, Local, UncOrMappedNetworkDrive, SkyDrive, App, SharePoint, UnknownServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7765">Possible values: None, Local, UncOrMappedNetworkDrive, SkyDrive, App, SharePoint, UnknownServer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7766">**FILETIME** – čas udalosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7766">**FILETIME** - Time of the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7767">**FirstBCSClientError_Info** – informácie o kóde chyby v súvislosti s konverziami súborov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7767">**FirstBCSClientError_Info** - Error code information related to file conversions</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7768">**HttpStatusCode**-http – kód odozvy HTTP pre žiadosť o webovú službu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7768">**HttpStatusCode** - HTTP response code for web service request</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7769">**InitalizationReason** – vstupný bod pre otvorenie súboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7769">**InitalizationReason** - entry point for file open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7770">**K2FileIOHresult** – kód Hresult pre ukončenie operácie otvorenia súboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7770">**K2FileIOHresult** - Hresult code for File open operation end</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7771">**LastBCSClientError_TagId** – posledná chyba klienta BCS (Binary Conversion Service)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7771">**LastBCSClientError_TagId** - last error of BCS (binary conversion service) client</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7772">**OfficeWebServiceApiStatusFlag** – príznak stavu pre žiadosť o webovú službu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7772">**OfficeWebServiceApiStatusFlag** - status flag for the web service request</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7773">**OpEndEventId** – značka, ktorá predstavuje miesto, kde sa operácia v skutočnosti ukončila</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7773">**OpEndEventId** - tag that represents where the operation actually ended</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7774">**OpFlags** – príznaky parametrov operácií s dokumentom, ktoré používa vrstva AppDocs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7774">**OpFlags** - Document operation param flags used by AppDocs layer.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7775">**OpSeqNum** – číslo, ktoré predstavuje postupnosť volaní súvisiacich s operáciami súborov vo vrstve AppDocs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7775">**OpSeqNum** - A number that represents the sequencing of file operation related calls in AppDocs layer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7776">**OpType** – enumerácia typu operácie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7776">**OpType** - operation type enumeration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7777">Hodnoty: "None", "CreateDocument", "OpenDocument", "CopyDocument", "CloseDocument", "SaveDocument", "OpenVersion", "CloseVersion"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7777">Values: "None", "CreateDocument", "OpenDocument", "CopyDocument", "CloseDocument", "SaveDocument", "OpenVersion", "CloseVersion"</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7778">**PreFetchState** – enumerácia stavu prednačítania šablón pre operácie vytvorenia nových súborov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7778">**PreFetchState** - enumeration for prefetch state of templates for new file create operations.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7779">**ProviderApp** – názov balíka aplikácie, z ktorej sa súbor otvoril</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7779">**ProviderApp** - the package name of the app from which file is opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7780">**ScopeInstanceId** – ID inštancie rozsahu, ktoré sa používa na pripojenie kontextu údajov k aktivitám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7780">**ScopeInstanceId** - Scope Instance ID used to join data context to activities</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7781">**Size** – veľkosť súboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7781">**Size** - file size</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7782">**State** – hodnota enumerácie pre stav súboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7782">**State** - enumeration value for the state of the file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7783">Hodnoty: None, Creating, Created, CreateFailed, Opening, Opened, OpenFailed, Copying, Copied, CopyFailed, Closing, Closed, CloseFail</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7783">Values: None, Creating, Created, CreateFailed, Opening, Opened, OpenFailed, Copying, Copied, CopyFailed, Closing, Closed, CloseFail</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7784">**TemplateName** – binárny názov šablóny v šablóne dokumentu zo služby šablón, napríklad TF10002009.dotx.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7784">**TemplateName** - the binary template name of the document template from the template service, for example, TF10002009.dotx</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7785">**UriScheme** – schéma URL adresy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7785">**UriScheme** - scheme of the URL</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidauthaceerrors"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7786">Office.Android.AuthACEErrors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7786">Office.Android.AuthACEErrors</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7787">Táto udalosť používa konto Microsoft (MSA) na určenie toho, ktorý používateľ sa pokúša prihlásiť do aplikácie, a počas toho ktorá telemetria sa spúšťa ako súčasť neúspešného pokusu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7787">This event uses the Microsoft Account (MSA) to determine which user is attempting to sign in to the app and during that which telemetry in discussion is getting triggered as part of an unsuccessful attempt.</span></span>  

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7788">Táto udalosť pomáha pri analýze rozdelenia chýb prihlásenia MSA, čo pomáha pochopiť dôvody neúspešného ukončenia procesu prihlasovania MSA.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7788">This event helps with MSA sign-in error distribution analysis, which helps in understanding reasons behind unsuccessful MSA sign-in flow end.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7789">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7789">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7790">**ExceptionsName** – označuje triedy výnimiek, ktoré sa týkajú značiek výnimiek, ktoré sa vyskytujú počas procesu prihlasovania do konta Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7790">**ExceptionsName** - indicates exception classes with regard to exception tags that occur during Microsoft account sign-in flow.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7791">**ExceptionsTag** – označuje, ktoré výnimky v procese prítomné v únii sa vyskytnú pre proces prihlásenia MSA.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7791">**ExceptionsTag** - indicates which inflow exceptions present in union are occurring for MSA-sign in flow.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7792">**IDCRLACEErrorCode** – poskytuje kód chyby, ktorá sa vyskytuje počas procesu prihlásenia MSA.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7792">**IDCRLACEErrorCode** - Gives error code occurring during MSA sign-in flow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7793">Rôzne kódy chýb sú uvedené v: %SRCROOT%\identity\coreapi\public\IdentityData.h</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7793">Different error codes mentioned at %SRCROOT%\identity\coreapi\public\IdentityData.h</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7794">**IDCRLAuthenticationStatusErrorCode** – označuje kódy chýb pre neplatný stav výsledku overovania z konta Microsoft (MSA).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7794">**IDCRLAuthenticationStatusErrorCode** - Indicates error codes for invalid status of Authentication result coming from Microsoft Account (MSA).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7795">**IDCRLUserInteractionMissingError** – označuje, či proces prihlasovania do konta Microsoft (MSA) vyvolaný s príznakom showUI ako false spôsobuje zhodu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7795">**IDCRLUserInteractionMissingError** - Indicates if Microsoft Account (MSA) sign-in flow invoked with showUI flag as false causing the hit.</span></span>


#### <a name="officeandroidbcserrors"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7796">Office.Android.BCS.Errors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7796">Office.Android.BCS.Errors</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7797">Telemetria chýb binárnej konverzie pri operáciách tlače a zdieľania vo formáte PDF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7797">Binary conversion Errors telemetry for Print and Share as PDF.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7798">Spoločnosť Microsoft používa túto možnosť na identifikáciu bodov zlyhania počas konverzií BCS v aplikáciách Word, Excel alebo PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7798">Microsoft uses this to identify failure points during BCS conversions in Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7799">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7799">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7800">**DocumentFileSize** – veľkosť súboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7800">**DocumentFileSize** - File size.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7801">**FileExtension** – prvé štyri znaky prípony súboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7801">**FileExtension** - First four characters of the extension of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7802">**IsFileDirty** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či sa v súbore nenachádzali neuložené zmeny.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7802">**IsFileDirty** - Boolean to indicate if there were unsaved changes in the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7803">**Location** – enumerácia umiestnenia súboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7803">**Location** - File location enumeration.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7804">Hodnoty: OneDrive, SharePoint, Dropbox, Others</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7804">Values: OneDrive, SharePoint, Dropbox, Others</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7805">**PDFConversionError** – značka, kde sa vyskytne chyba pri konverzii PDF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7805">**PDFConversionError** - Tag at which error occurs for PDF conversion</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7806">**PdfConversionErrorCode** – kód chyby konverzie PDF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7806">**PdfConversionErrorCode** - PDF conversion error code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7807">**PdfConversionHRStatus** – kód stavu konverzie PDF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7807">**PdfConversionHRStatus** - PDF conversion status code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7808">**PdfConversionResult** – enumerácia výsledku konverzie PDF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7808">**PdfConversionResult** - PDF Conversion result enumeration.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7809">Hodnoty: „Success“, „Failed“, „Cancelled“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7809">Values: "Success", "Failed" and "Canceled"</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7810">**PdfFileSize** – veľkosť PDF súboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7810">**PdfFileSize** - Size of the PDF</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidclientsideiap"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7811">Office.Android.ClientSideIAP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7811">Office.Android.ClientSideIAP</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7812">Telemetria kritických chýb v prípade zlyhania databázy pri prehľadávaní súborov a pridávaní miest.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7812">Critical Error telemetry for Database Failure while file browsing and adds places.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7813">Spoločnosť Microsoft používa túto možnosť na identifikovanie problémov s poškodením databázy v aplikáciách, ktoré môžu brániť používateľovi v pridávaní miest alebo prehľadávaní cez aplikáciu v rámci aplikácií Word, Excel alebo PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7813">Microsoft uses this to identify DB corruption issues in the apps which might hinder user to add places or browse through them from within the app in Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7814">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7814">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7815">**ClientTransactionId** – identifikátor GUID, ktorý sa odovzdá do DSC na účely konkrétnej žiadosti o uplatnenie nároku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7815">**ClientTransactionId** - GUID passed to DSC for a specific Redemption request.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7816">**CollectionTime** – čas dokončenia kúpy predplatného</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7816">**CollectionTime** - time of subscription purchase completion</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7817">**CountryCode** – kód krajiny klienta, ktorý sa odošle do DSC na účely žiadosti klienta o uplatnenie nároku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7817">**CountryCode** - Client country code that is sent to DSC for client redemption request</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7818">**GoPremiumEntryPoint** – vstupný bod spustenia nákupu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7818">**GoPremiumEntryPoint** - entry point for triggering purchase</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7819">**IsActivateExistingSubscription** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či sa našlo existujúce predplatné, ktoré bolo aktivované.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7819">**IsActivateExistingSubscription** - Boolean to indicate if there was an existing subscription that was activated</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7820">**IsErrorRetriable** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či je možné zopakovať pokus o uplatnenie nároku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7820">**IsErrorRetriable** - Boolean to indicate if redemption can be retried</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7821">**IsPreviousPurchase** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či došlo k aktivácii pri predchádzajúcom zakúpení predplatného</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7821">**IsPreviousPurchase** - Boolean to indicate if activation occurred with a previous purchase of subscription</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7822">**IsProvisioningTriggeredByRetry** – Boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či došlo k opakovanému pokusu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7822">**IsProvisioningTriggeredByRetry** - Boolean to indicate if retry was involved</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7830">**SubscriptionPurchaseHR** – kód HResult úlohy zakúpenia predplatného</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7830">**SubscriptionPurchaseHR** - Hresult for subscription purchase task</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7831">**SubscriptionType** – enumerácia typu predplatného alebo jednotiek SKU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7831">**SubscriptionType** - enumeration for subscription type or SKUs.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroiddbfailurecause"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7833">Office.Android.DBFailureCause</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7833">Office.Android.DBFailureCause</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7834">Telemetria kritických chýb v prípade zlyhania databázy pri prehľadávaní súborov a pridávaní miest.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7834">Critical Error telemetry for Database Failure while file browsing and adds places.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7835">Spoločnosť Microsoft používa túto možnosť na identifikovanie problémov s poškodením databázy v aplikáciách, ktoré môžu brániť používateľovi v pridávaní miest alebo prehľadávaní cez aplikáciu v rámci aplikácií Word, Excel alebo PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7835">Microsoft uses this to identify DB corruption issues in the apps which might hinder user to add places or browse through them from within the app in Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7836">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7836">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7837">**ErrorAt** – hodnota značky: informácie o mieste, kde sa vyskytlo zlyhanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7837">**ErrorAt** - Tag Value: Information about the place where the Failure happened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7838">**ExceptionErrorMessage** – podrobné chybové hlásenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7838">**ExceptionErrorMessage** - verbose error message</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidearlytelemetryexpansionfileserrors"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7839">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.ExpansionFilesErrors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7839">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.ExpansionFilesErrors</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7840">Rozširujúce súbory súpravy Android Package Kit (APK) pre mobilnú aplikáciu Office sú doplnkové zdrojové súbory, ktoré môžu vývojári aplikácií pre Android publikovať spolu so svojou aplikáciou.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7840">Android Package Kit (APK) expansion files for the Office mobile app are supplementary resource files that Android app developers can publish along with their app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7841">Aby bol náš mechanizmus sťahovania rozširujúcich súborov spoľahlivejší, zaznamenávame príčiny chýb, ktoré sa vyskytujú pri sťahovaní rozširujúcich súborov alebo pri čítaní stiahnutých rozširujúcich súborov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7841">To make our Expansion files download mechanism more reliable, we are logging the cause of errors that occur either in downloading the expansion files or while reading the downloaded expansion files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7842">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7842">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7843">**Data_ClassName** – text zastupujúci názov súboru zdrojového kódu, v ktorom došlo k chybe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7843">**Data_ClassName** - Text representing the source code file name where there is an error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7844">**Data_ErrorMessage** – text zastupujúci operáciu, ktorá zlyhala.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7844">**Data_ErrorMessage** - Text representing the operation that has failed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7845">**Data_ExceptionMessage** – voliteľné textové pole, ktoré predstavuje príčinu výnimky.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7845">**Data_ExceptionMessage** - An optional text field representing the cause of the exception.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7846">**Data_ExceptionType** – voliteľné textové pole, ktoré predstavuje názov vygenerovaný zo zdrojového kódu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7846">**Data_ExceptionType** - An optional text field representing the name of the exception thrown from source code.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7847">**Data_MethodName** – text zastupujúci názov metódy v zdrojovom kóde, v ktorom došlo k chybe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7847">**Data_MethodName** - Text representing the method name in source code where there is an error.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidearlytelemetryextractionerror"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7848">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.ExtractionError</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7848">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.ExtractionError</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7849">Na zmenšenie veľkosti aplikácií balíka Office pre Android používame komprimáciu zdrojov v konečnom balíku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7849">To reduce the size of Office Android apps, we apply compression to the resources in the final package.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7850">V čase spustenia najskôr extrahujeme tieto zdroje pred ich použitím.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7850">At run time, we first extract these resources before using them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7851">Niekedy sa vyskytnú neočakávané chyby pri vykonávaní extrakcie, čo vedie k zlyhaniam aplikácie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7851">Sometimes there are unexpected errors while performing extractions, which leads to app crashes.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7852">Prostredníctvom tejto udalosti sa zhromažďujú niektoré diagnostické informácie týkajúce sa extrakcie, ako sú napríklad názov extrahovaného zdroja, cesta extrakcie, voľné miesto na disku atď. Tieto údaje sa zhromažďujú len v prípade, že sa vyskytnú chyby pri extrakcii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7852">Through this event we are collecting some diagnostic information related to extraction, like name of the resource being extracted, path where its extracted etc., free disk space available etc. This data is collected only when there are extraction errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7853">Tieto údaje používame na pochopenie príčiny zlyhaní extrakcie a zlepšenie funkčnosti našich aplikácií.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7853">We use this data to understand the cause of extraction failures, and to improve the user experience of our apps.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7854">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7854">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7855">**Data_ArchiveName** – názov extrahovaného zdroja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7855">**Data_ArchiveName** - Name of the resource that is being extracted.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7856">**Data_ArchivePath** – cesta, v ktorej je zdroj dočasne uložený vo vyrovnávacej pamäti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7856">**Data_ArchivePath** - Path where the resource is temporarily cached.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7857">**Data_ArchiveSizeKB** – veľkosť extrahovaného zdroja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7857">**Data_ArchiveSizeKB** - Size of the resource that is being extracted.</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7858">**Data_ClassName** – názov súboru v zdrojovom kóde, kde došlo k chybe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7858">**Data_ClassName** - File name in source code where the error is encountered.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7859">**Data_ErrorDetail** – text s popisom ďalších podrobností o príčine chyby, ako je napríklad kód chyby atď.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7859">**Data_ErrorDetail** - Text describing more details about the cause of the error, like the error code etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7860">**Data_ErrorMessage** – text s popisom typu chyby, ktorá sa vyskytla pri extrakcii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7860">**Data_ErrorMessage** - Text describing the type of error encountered during extraction.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7861">**Data_ExtractionDestinationPath** – cesta, kam sa zdroj uloží po extrakcii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7861">**Data_ExtractionDestinationPath** - Path where the resource is to be saved after extraction.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7862">**Data_FreeDiskSpaceMB** – množstvo voľného miesta dostupného v zariadení v megabajtoch.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7862">**Data_FreeDiskSpaceMB** - The amount of free disk space available on the device measured in Mega Bytes.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7863">**Data_ItemToExtract** – názov extrahovaného zdroja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7863">**Data_ItemToExtract** - Name of the resource that is being extracted.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7864">**Data_MethodName** – názov metódy v zdrojovom kóde, kde došlo k chybe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7864">**Data_MethodName** - Method name in source code where the error is encountered.</span></span>


#### <a name="officeandroidearlytelemetryregistryerrors"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7865">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.RegistryErrors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7865">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.RegistryErrors</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7866">Táto udalosť zachytáva všetky chyby, ktoré sa vyskytli počas prístupu do databázy Registry pre Android.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7866">This event captures any errors faced during Android registry access.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7867">Údaje tejto udalosti nám pomáhajú pochopiť chyby používateľov a zlepšiť fungovanie funkcie databázy Registry.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7867">This event data helps us in understanding the user errors and making the registry feature more robust.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7868">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7868">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7869">**App** – Proces aplikácie, ktorý odosiela udalosť.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7869">**App** – The application process sending the event.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7870">**AppVersionLong** – Verzia aplikácie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7870">**AppVersionLong** – The application version.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7871">**Data_StackTrace** – Stopa zásobníka chyby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7871">**Data_StackTrace** – The stacktrace of the error.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidearlytelemetrysharedlibraryloadersearchandloadlibraryerror"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-7872">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.SharedLibraryLoadersearchAndloadLibraryError</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7872">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.SharedLibraryLoadersearchAndloadLibraryError</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7873">Túto udalosť zaznamenáme v prípade, že sa pri načítavaní zdieľaných knižníc vyskytnú chyby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7873">We log this event in case there are errors while loading shared libraries.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7874">Chyby pri načítavaní knižníc sa môžu vyskytnúť z dvoch dôvodov: 1) Nainštalovaná aplikácia nie je kompatibilná so zariadením.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7874">There can be library loading errors for two reasons 1) Installed Apk is incompatible with the device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7875">2) Knižnica, ktorú sa pokúšame načítať, môže byť poškodená z dôvodu chýb v jej extrahovaní pre nedostatok miesta na disku alebo v pamäti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7875">2) The library that we are trying to load may be corrupt, because of errors in extracting it due to low disk space, or low memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7876">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7876">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7877">**Data_ExceptionMessage** – hlásenie výnimky zobrazené rozhraním Android API System.loadlibrary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7877">**Data_ExceptionMessage** - Exception message thrown by Android API System.loadlibrary</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7878">**Data_FreeSpaceInMB** – dostupné voľné miesto v zariadení</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7878">**Data_FreeSpaceInMB** - Free space available on device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7879">**Data_nickName** – názov knižnice, ktorá sa nedá načítať.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7879">**Data_nickName** - Name of the library that couldn't be loaded.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7983">**PreviousEntryPoint** – enumerácia vstupného bodu spustenia procesu aktivácie licencie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7983">**PreviousEntryPoint** - Entrypoint enumeration for triggering the license activation flow</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7984">**StateAfterActivation** – enumerácia označujúca stav licencie aplikácie pred spustením procesu aktivácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7984">**StateAfterActivation** - enumeration to indicate licensing state of the app before the activation flow started</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7985">**StateBeforeActivation** – enumerácia označujúca stav licencie aplikácie pred spustením procesu aktivácie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7985">**StateBeforeActivation** - enumeration to indicate licensing state of the app before the activation flow started</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7988">Táto udalosť označuje, že sa používateľovi zobrazila výzva na prihlásenie do osobného konta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7988">This event denotes that sign-in prompt came to the user, for personal account.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7989">Táto udalosť pomáha porozumieť stavu prihlásenia našich aplikácií a vykonať príslušné akcie, keď si všimneme neočakávané opakované výzvy na prihlásenie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7989">This event helps in understanding the health of signed in state of our apps and take appropriate actions, when we notice unexpected sign-in re-prompts.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-7990">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7990">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7991">**ExternalCacheRefreshError** – kód chyby pokusu o obnovenie tokenu pred zobrazením výzvy na prihlásenie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7991">**ExternalCacheRefreshError** - Error code of token refresh attempt, before showing sign-in prompt.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7992">**LastLoginDelta** – čas od posledného úspešného prihlásenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7992">**LastLoginDelta** - The time delta from last successful login.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7993">**MSAserverUAID** – ID korelácie s údajmi telemetrie služby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7993">**MSAserverUAID** - Correlation ID with service telemetry data.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7994">**PreviousIdentityState** – označuje stav konta, napríklad uplynutie platnosti relácie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7994">**PreviousIdentityState** - Indicates state of the account, like session expired.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7995">**SignInResultCode** – označuje kód výsledku ukončenia výzvy na prihlásenie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7995">**SignInResultCode** - Indicates the result code of sign-in prompt end.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7996">**UseCache** – označuje, či sme vynútili výzvu pre používateľa na opätovné zadanie hesla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7996">**UseCache** - Indicates if we force prompted the user to provide the password again.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7997">**UserType** – označuje, či ide o existujúce konto alebo nové konto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7997">**UserType** - Indicates whether it is existing account or new account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-7998">**WasIdentitySignedOut** – označuje, či sa konto nachádzalo v stave odhlásenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-7998">**WasIdentitySignedOut** - Indicates if account was in signed out state.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-8003">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8003">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8004">**Data_DigitalRiverID** – ID produktu Digital River, ktoré mapuje na jednotku SKU tohto produktu balíka Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8004">**Data_DigitalRiverID** - Digital River product ID that maps to this Office product SKY</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8005">**Data_Error** – Reťazec, ktorý predstavuje kód chyby aktivácie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8005">**Data_Error** - A string representing an activation error code.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8006">**Data_ProductKey** – Kód Product Key, u ktorého prebehol pokus o aktiváciu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8006">**Data_ProductKey** - Product key that was attempted to be activated</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8007">**Data_ProductKeyHash** – Zakódovaný aktivovaný kód Product Key.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8007">**Data_ProductKeyHash** - An encoded product key being activated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-8009">Táto udalosť sa zhromažďuje pre aplikácie balíka Office spustené v rámci platforiem Apple.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8009">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8010">Udalosť zhromažďuje vrátený kód chyby, pričom sa pravidelne kontroluje platnosť licencie na predplatné.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8010">The event collects the error code returned while periodically checking the validity of a subscription license.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8011">Kód chyby môže znamenať nedostupnosť servera, ale aj uplynutie platnosti licencie, obmedzenie počtu prístrojov, neplatné ID hardvéru atď. #### <a name="officegraphicsarcexceptions"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-8027">Office.Graphics.ARCExceptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8027">Office.Graphics.ARCExceptions</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-8028">Tieto informácie o nahlásení výnimky sú dôležité na posúdenie celkového stavu zásobníka grafiky, ako aj na identifikáciu častí kódu, v ktorých sa zlyhania vyskytujú s vysokou frekvenciou, aby sa stanovili priority skúmania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8028">This exception reporting information is important for assessing the overall health of the graphics stack, as well as identifying parts of the code where failures are occurring at high frequency, in order to prioritize investigation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8029">Tieto informácie o nahlásení výnimky sú dôležité na posúdenie celkového stavu zásobníka grafiky, ako aj na identifikáciu častí kódu, v ktorých sa zlyhania vyskytujú s vysokou frekvenciou.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8029">This exception reporting information is important for assessing the overall health of the graphics stack, and identifying parts of the code where failures are occurring at high frequency.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8030">Pomáhajú inžinierovi určiť, ktoré zlyhania vykresľovania ovplyvňujú väčšinu používateľov, čo nám umožní stanoviť priority nášho skúmania s cieľom vyriešenia problémov, ktoré budú mať najväčší úžitok pre používateľov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8030">This helps an engineer to determine which rendering failures are impacting the most users, enabling us to prioritize our investigations toward fixing issues that will have the greatest user benefit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-8031">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8031">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8032">**Data\_HResult** – chybový kód vrátený zo zlyhania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8032">**Data\_HResult** - The error code returned from failure</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8033">**Data\_TagCount** – počet všetkých zlyhaní, ktoré sa vyskytli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8033">**Data\_TagCount** - The count of each failure that occurred</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8034">**Data\_TagID** – identifikátor zlyhania, ktoré sa vyskytlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8034">**Data\_TagID** - The identifier of the failure that occurred</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-8041">Úspešné alebo neúspešné otvorenie e-mailového ukladacieho priestoru chráneného technológiou Enterprise Data Protection na základe výsledku volania rozhrania API systému Windows na získanie kľúča na dešifrovanie ukladacieho priestoru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8041">Success or failure to open the Enterprise Data Protection protected mail store based on result of Windows API call to get the key to decrypt the store.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8042">Táto udalosť sa používa na diagnostikovanie jedného z najčastejších problémov s technológiou Enterprise Data Protection, ktorý môže zabrániť spusteniu Outlooku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8042">We use this diagnose one of the top Enterprise Data Protection issues, which can prevent Outlook from booting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8043">Primárnou príčinou zlyhania je interakcia Outlooku s rozhraním API systému Windows, ktoré sa používa na dešifrovanie kľúča ukladacieho priestoru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8043">Primary cause of failure is Outlooks interaction with Windows APIs used to decrypt the store key.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeoutlookdesktopndbcorruptionresult"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-8047">Office.Outlook.Desktop.NdbCorruptionResult</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8047">Office.Outlook.Desktop.NdbCorruptionResult</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-8048">Udalosti Office.Outlook.Desktop.NdbCorruptionResult a Office.Outlook.Desktop.NDBCorruptStore.Warning sa zhromažďujú, keď zistíme poškodenie súboru súborov PST/OST používateľa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8048">Office.Outlook.Desktop.NdbCorruptionResult and Office.Outlook.Desktop.NDBCorruptStore.Warning are collected when we detect corruption in a user's PST/OST.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8049">Keď zistíme poškodenie, spoločnosť Microsoft zhromažďuje formát databázy, miesto zistenia a malé množstvo kontextu o poškodení.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8049">When we detect corruption, Microsoft collects the format of the database, the place where detected it, and a small amount of context about the corruption.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8050">Poškodenie súborov OST/PST zabraňuje používateľom v prístupe k e-mailom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8050">OST/PST corruption prevents users from accessing their emails.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8051">Tieto údaje sa aktívne monitorujú na zisťovanie abnormálnej aktivity.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8051">We actively monitor this data for anomalous activity.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8052">Našou snahou je skúmať a diagnostikovať problémy na obmedzenie straty údajov zákazníkov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8052">We aim to investigate and diagnose issues to limit loss of customer data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-8053">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8053">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8054">**0** – názov procesu, ktorý nahlásil poškodenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8054">**0 -** The Process name that reported corruption</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8055">**1** – boolovská hodnota, ktorá označuje, či si používateľ vybral nový súbor alebo nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8055">**1 -** Bool indicating if the user chooses new file or not</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8056">**2** – počet ďalších procesov, ktoré majú otvorenú databázu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8056">**2 -** the number of other processes that have the database open</span></span>

#### <a name="officeoutlookdesktopndbcorruptstorewarning"></a><span data-ttu-id="b136d-8057">Office.Outlook.Desktop.NDBCorruptStore.Warning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8057">Office.Outlook.Desktop.NDBCorruptStore.Warning</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b136d-8063">Zhromažďujú sa tieto polia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8063">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8064">**CollectionTime** – čas zhromaždenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8064">**CollectionTime** - collection time</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8065">**Context** – kontext poškodeného ukladacieho priestoru, kde sa zistilo poškodenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8065">**Context** - Corrupt Store Context, where corruption was detected</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8066">**CreatedWithVersion** – (voliteľné) pole s verziou ukladacieho priestoru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8066">**CreatedWithVersion** – (Optional) field with version of store</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8067">**Details** – podrobnosti o zlyhaní</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8067">**Details** – Details about the crash</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8068">**NdbType** – typ ukladacieho priestoru, môže byť 0 = NdbUndefined; 1 = NdbSmall; 2 = NdbLarge; 3 = NdbTardis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8068">**NdbType** - Store Type, can be 0 = NdbUndefined, 1 = NdbSmall, 2 = NdbLarge, 3 = NdbTardis</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8069">**ProcessName** – názov procesu spôsobujúceho poškodenie ukladacieho priestoru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8069">**ProcessName** - Process Name causing the store to get corrupted</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8070">**PstVersion** – verzia súboru MSPST32.DLL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8070">**PstVersion** - Version of the MSPST32.DLL</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="b136d-8071">**Version** – verzia formátu súboru ukladacieho priestoru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b136d-8071">**Version** - Version of store file format</span></span>
